She can't see you and lifts up her foot you're about to be squashed!
11111121.content: You were a young handsome 14 year old boy living just outside Salt Lake City,Utah attending the local middle school though you were somewhat popular you didn't have a girlfriend and had just woken up from a long night's sleep as you ad been working your first job:a all nighter at a fast food joint it was Saturday morning and you originally planned on staying in bed all day but your work schedule was heretic you needed the hours anyway but you got up anyway noticing neither of your parents were at home "Guess they're out shopping!" You thought as you waked outside to get the morning paper knowing how your old man was obsessed with the sports section surprisingly the neighborhood was fairly empty only a handful of people were out and they were rapidly packing up their cars and SUVS you didn't pay much attention after all it was the middle of summer vacation as you went back into the house you turned on the TV and the first thing you see is a flash news bulletin on your local news channel "This just in some sort of enormous monstrous creature had been spotted in the downtown area of the city and is making its way towards..." Ka-Booom! The reporter's finishing sentence was cut off as half the ceiling had collapsed luckily most of the news crew got out in time as a massive tremor could be heard echoing throughout the city you felt the whole house shake pictures fell off the walls,electric appliances exploded sending sparks everywhere and you struggled to maintain your balance as the floor beneath you cracked and just outside you could make out the terrified screams of your remaining neighbors as they panicked even more as the sky outside turned from blue,cloudless and sunny to pitch black as if the mother of all twisters were about to ravage through your town "It's not longer safe in here I gotta to get out of the house before it collapses on me!" You thought as quickly you manage to grab a few belongings and treasured items before bolting out the front door you witness your whole house collapsing in a heap of rubble "Damn that's bad luck mom and dad will have a cow when they get home,good thing we have paid all the insurance on this house." But this was no time for humor as all around you things like cars,mailboxes and other people's homes were shaking,falling over or plain just exploding on the spot then the soft tremors became louder and louder as someone in the now thick crowd screamed "Oh my God look there it is! The monster!" You began pushing and shoving your way through the crowd as it was hard as hell to see anything(you were short what could you do?) then as you got to the front you saw a enormous pair of shoes but they weren't just any shoes they looked like they belonged to someone special a movie actor as they were sparkling bright and had to be the size of a full sized SUV itself! Then you kept on looking up and up and up to see something big,bright and red filled the whole street it had to be a dress of some kind so obliviously this monster whatever it was had to be female the footsteps and tremors stopped suddenly just before the crowd of people screaming,whispering and panicking then the titanic figure slowly bent over and people screamed like crazy several backed away as what stared back at them was some kind of circus clown,a girl about your age wearing the oddest outfit with a face of a angel she had a pale white face filled with what appeared to be the oddest amount of makeup,dark pretty brown eyes,short brown hair underneath a odd type of headdress those in the 15th century would wear but you couldn't think of any person or royalty from history who would dress like this but the more you stared at this monstrous girl,the more you felt like you knew her from somewhere "She really looks familiar where have I seen her before?" Thinking back to all the movies over the years you seen one stuck out Star Wars not the old original trilogy but the recent one that hit theaters earlier this summer(it was the year 1999) then it slowly dawned on you "Wait a second this is...nah it can't be...there's no way but somehow it is....Queen Amidala from the Phantom Menace here on Earth as a Godzilla like giantess?" It had to be a prank,a joke of some kind maybe some guys from Hollywood decided to get creative a create a lifelike mechanic prop of their favorite movie characters rampaging as Godzilla but deep down something told you this was the actual,real thing; this was a 70 foot Queen Amidala of Naboo in the flesh as she bent down further you were unsure whether she could even see any of you the crowd behind you panicked and ran for it screaming like crazy while you realized you were all alone with the giantess alien queen

111111212111.content: Despite the Queen's gentleness most of the people are completely terrified of her and standing thousands of feet above the ground who could blame them? Amidala senses their gear and says calmly "Please don't be alarmed I won't harm any of you I merely need help figuring out where I am,I was sent to this strange world by unknown means as my own faraway planet is being ravaged by treason and treacherous events please can anyone tell me where I am?" She despite her bizarre white face paint looked desperate and sad some of the people muttered answers but she couldn't hear them "What,what did you say I couldn't hear." "EARTH YOU'RE A PLANET CALLED EARTH!" A few screamed at the top of their lungs Amidala's eyebrows widen "Earth? Never heard of that planet before can you tell me about it?" As she spoke a few people noticed finally she was beginning to move but then they realized she was about to sit down! And right beneath where she was about to sit was City Hall where the mayor and several government officials were panicking at the mere sight of her squatting down slowly "Mayor what do we do? That alien girl,whatever she is is about to sit on us,somebody do something!" A nearby police officer muttered "I already informed the military mayor they're on their way now! Let's just hope they get here in.....Ahhhhhhhhh! Here she comes RUN FOR IT!" As all in the main office bolted out the door and barely made it outside just as Ka-Pow! Amidala sat down directly and unknowingly on the whole building whatever remained of it was crushed under likes of her enormous red dress and massive behind leaving nothing intact or recognizable she breathed a sigh of relief as she sat down "Ahhh what a relief my feet were killing me standing on them for too long....why are you all complaining and screaming like that for?" She asked the people in her hand and on the ground,the mayor and his officials among them in shock several screamed "Because you just sat on our government building,look beneath you!" Curiously she did and gasped when she saw the amount of damage her assets had done to their once fair City Hall quickly she stood up and people dive for cover as piles of rocks and marble came crashing down all around them "Oh my! I'm truly sorry about that! I didn't mean to do it!" She whispered her free hand over her mouth she truly looked mournful and nearly tearful it was hard to tell though but before anyone could do anything the loud buzzing sounds of tanks and jets and helicopters filled the ground and air:the military had arrived to deal with this giant space Queen from another galaxy!

But now Sara was gone and came back to Starling city, and althought that Nyssa tried everything, Sara choose to stay. There were only one way left for Nyssa to force Sara to come back. The Forbbiden Power in the Dark Book she received as a gift when she was 10 years old. For her knowledges about magic, and not for her to use in any case. Her father was clear about that.

But even if she could betray him and use the Book for her selfish will, how Sara will react ? Does her feeling for Nyssa will change if she tries to force Sara to stay with her ? Nyssa didn't know, the only thing she knows anyway is that someday she would need to get free from Ras'al Ghul. And the Spell from the Book she was thinking about was the best way to solve all her problems : The Growth Spell.

Nyssa remembered she often tried to imagine how it could be to be a giant when she discovered this part of the book in her childhood. She had some fantaisies about it, and she even asked some questions to Sara last year before their sleep.

*Flashback *

" Sara. Can i ask you a question ? "

" Sure love. Everything you want. "

" what would you like to do if you were, a giantess ? "

" seriously ? Is that your question ? " Sara laughed before she replied : " well. I guess, i would protect my friends, my family...and i would keep you all for myself. That's a weird question you know. But i like the idea of a tiny you, so i could put you in some special place i'm sure you would love to be in. And you'll never leave me

* end flashback *

Nyssa smiled at this memorie and got her answer. When you love someone, you do everyhing you can to not let her go.

As she just made her decision, Nyssa took the book and left Panda Narbat, making sure on the way that no one saw her. It took her two days to join Starling city, and once she has arrived, she decided to use the Growth Spell, aware of the panick she will create with her new size. It was not a problem as she would be invincible also. It was her last option.

choices: Nyssa has a 'vacation', and visits Sara (& Team Arrow) in Starling
Sara returns to her beloved and they have some fun in Nanda Parbat.
12532112221121.content:
(Okay so in this world Nyssa becomes the new Ra's after her father is killed by Oliver instead of Merlyn [which was stupid] and she keeps the League and makes it her own rather than disband the entire thing [again, stupid]. Finally in this point in time Sara has come back from her LOT time jumping adventure, Laurel isn't dead [saying this might mean nothing soon enough but new Flash and Arrow haven't reached Ireland yet so as far as I know she's still dead in canon] )

Nyssa gasped as she rose from the Pit, smiling slightly as the water's much stronger glow washed over her before removing herself and wrapping up in a robe. She had performed her consummation act, her first as the new Ra's and a ritual all previous ones had also done: First they bathe in the Pit, allowing it's mystical energy to fill them and give them strength beyond any normal human. It was this boost which enabled many Ra's to rein for over a century. The second stage was that a vial of the waters were collected while it was still filled with her life essence and at it's most powerful and made into a powerful augmentation potion, anything the current Ra's desired. In the past there had been many who gained intellect, strength and strange abilities from the potions and elixirs the waters created.

The mystics worked hard to fulfil Nyssa's 'unique' request, given her heritage it came to no surprise Nyssa saw herself well above the rest, she had been raised heir to the most powerful man on the planet of course she was, but it was more the form which it took in her mind, she saw herself towering over the lands, staring down at the average human and crushing them like they were an insect. It was an intoxicating fantasy.
But Nyssa was different that her predecessors, her father most of all, she knew nobody could be Ra's 24/7.She needed and deserved the ability to relax and release the vice like grip she had on control. It was one of the things that she loved about Sara: the girl could give as good as she took and on occasion was able to overpower her and take what she desired from the future Demon, not that Nyssa was helpless she could easily turn the tables, but she didn't want to. She knew she'd be fine and that her beloved wouldn't actually do anything she disapproved off, but it was simply the fact she could relax and let Sara take charge. She blamed the level of control she required on her father own control issues, and knew Sara would use her power over her much better than their previous holder.

It took a month of work but finally it was completed, Nyssa held the deep red potion which would give her, her wish: to be able to alter her size anywhere between 400 ft and 5 inches tall. Her formal ''Ra's the Demon Lord'' robes were one of the few things that were capable of surviving her growth or shrinking down with her, as well as a set of formfitting armour, but she didn't care as they'd do for any serious reasons for her power use and if she was having fun she wouldn't need them anyway.

So...
12532112221121.title: Ascension of the (size)Demon

choices: A little fun with the girls
125321122211211.content:
Nyssa sighed as she finally reached Star City airport, she could've used her own transport but she presumed some of Sara was rubbing off on her as she wanted it to feel like an authentic 'vacation' and it would be much more of a surprise for the blond than if anything League of Assassins showed up. Plus in her mind it was a lot more fun to walk up to her unaware, grab her from behind and carry her to the nearest bedroom.
She was still glad she'd chosen 1st class though, and her more relaxed expression showed that as she gave her passport to the security: of the many names she'd used for League business, Nyssa Raatko was the only one she'd never performed anything even potentially illegal with (other than it's existence in the first place), which given she was using her mother's maiden name, the only non-league member she'd ever cared about made sense (Sara doesn't count as she's LOA). It being essentially squeaky clean certainly meant things went by lot faster.

Taking a taxi (again, trying to have a normal holiday) she made it to her hotel and checked in, dropping off her belongings before trying to figure out just what to do first now she was actually in Star City

So, what now?

1)She decides to try this whole Hero business who beloved seems to enjoy (though it might more so be all the ass she gets to kick... in which case Nyssa will enjoy it just as much). Finding Team Arrow over run by Ghosts and Darhk, she uses her powers to even the odds as well as shock all but one of the group (she'd mentioned her fantasies and planned ascension gift to Sara before).
2)Nyssa and Sara were in a semi-open relationship: they loved each other with all their heart, but they did allow the other to at least give it a shot with people they aprove of, as apposed to any random chick off the street. Sara's approved list actually included all the females she'd worked with as a hero (practically all the important female characters in Flash, Arrow and LOT, but mainly Felicity, Thea & Caitlyn) with the exceptions of Laurel which Nyssa understood as she wouldn't be confertable with Sara pursuing Talia either. Seeing as this entire vacation as to unwind, Nyssa thought it would be a wonderful chance to properly try out her shrinking abilites with some very beautiful and very willing volunteers, be that just Sara, one of the girls, or a crazy mixture of both.
125321122211211.title: Even the Demon needs time off

choices: Nyssa drops off Thea with Felicity and has fun with Sara (T&F can do whatever)
The three of them find some privacy and amuse themeselves.
1253211222112111.content:
Seeing as it was late afternoon, Nyssa decided to go out in 'hero-wear' and find Sara and the others, partly because there would be no time to do anything if she didn't. Not really bothering to unpack she just pulled her armour (he usual LOA gear she wears in the show) and slipped out the window, forgoing a bow due to wanting to test out her powers in a real life setting.

By the time she found the team it was dark and they were getting to their usual night job: Kicking Ghost ass. Unfortunately tonight they were being overrun by the bastards as well as Darhk being there himself, his magic practically flinging them around. Nyssa frowned, then practically snarled when she saw Sara get thrown through one of the walls, deciding that unlike most League training to fuck subtly and use her power now. Breathing deeply Nyssa felt the energy build inside and her body quickly expanded till she was about 120ft tall. Grinning she stepped into the area very quickly getting the attention of everyone in the area, for once Darhk and Oliver having the same thoughts, mainly 'Oh shit' while almost everyone else was silent in shock (Sara more being silent in awe). Darhk finally snaps out of it long enough to order the ghosts to target Nyssa, the brunette smirks before squatting and swinging her arm, sending several of them flying and making the others more worried about attacking her. Darhk sneers in annoyance and tries to use his magic on her, but one of the side effects of all the elixirs is a high resistance to most forms of magic. His distraction caused by focusing so hard on Nyssa meant he wasn't aware of Sara sneaking up behind him, though he did become aware when she cracked him over the head with her Bo staff. Seeing their boss fall, several of the Ghosts panicked, but were captured by Oliver, Laurel, Thea & Diggle before they could get away.

''Nyssa'' Sara called up, the others staying far enough away as they were still a little afraid of the giantess, ''Hello beloved, seems you are having some fun'' ''Yeah, just until Darhk showed up then it just got painful'' Sara replied, giving the unconscious bastard an extra kick for good measure ''Well I'm glad I could help'' ''Yeah, thanks for that'' Oliver said sincerely and Nyssa smiled, before noticing Thea was staring at her enormous.... assets. Nyssa catches Sara's eye and flicks her own over to Thea. Sara grins up at Nyssa before giving the red archer a slight shove in her direction, Thea gulped in fear as the new Demon picked her up and brought her to her face ''I'm about to die, aren't I?'' she asked rhetorically, causing Nyssa to laugh before using a nail to remove her mask and let it tumble to the ground ''No darling, at least not anytime soon'' she says with a grin before dropping her down the front of her armour, catching the younger archer between her breasts. It wasn't long after that the police arrived, Lance as usual at the front, though even he had to stop and do a double take when he saw Darhk, several Ghosts, the vigilantes, and finally the giantess Nyssa. Worried for the health/heart of her beloved's father, Nyssa decided it was best to return to a reasonable height, quickly shrinking down to 5ft 5(Can't find actress's height, but presumed now she has the power, she'd like to be taller than her lover)

''Damn another meta-human, well at least you got this bastard'' Lance said before like his daughter giving the blond a kick, when Nyssa gave him a confused look he answered ''He's been threatening my girls since he showed how much of a bastard he is'' Nyssa nods in understanding. ''Detective, we'll require some cuffs from you'' Oliver said to him, Lance just looks at him ''Darhk has powerful magic, his very touch seems to cause damage to people. Might as well let the people fully covered to do it.'' Sara answered, Oliver and Nyssa nodding in agreement ''Fine'' Lance sighed, before handing her the cuffs, which she immediately used to secure him while the Ghosts were taken away by the other officers. ''Detective, I am aware many people have managed to escape justice through exploiting the corruption inherent in this city, I need you to understand this can't happen with this man. You have to make sure this is done right, or else I will kill him myself for being an enemy of the League and more importantly for harming my beloved'' Nyssa whispers to him, the man paling slightly but he understood, part of him wanted to kill the man for everything he's done.

With things quieting down Nyssa slid over to Sara, the blond smiles feeling her lover pressed against her ''Just the armour?'' Sara asks in amusement ''It's the only thing that changes with me, well besides 'passengers' of course'' Nyssa answers with a wink watching Sara's pupil's dilate with distinct amusement ''You, me, the lair now!'' she growls shuffling the raven haired woman towards her motorcycle.

So...

Someone from the Arrow Team save him
1253212111.content:
It"s been two months since Oliver and the others joined their forces to fight the "dominators", maybe the most crazy thing Oliver had ever imagine to face in his quest. Metahumans were already something difficult to live with, but being aware of aliens like dominators or even Supergirl was something he just couldn't accept deeply inside him. Of course after the last events, he trusted her somehow...
But Oliver often wondered what he could possibly do to stop her if Kara was a vilain and decided to destroy his Earth. Absolutely nothing. That day when the legends were mind controlled by the Dominator, only Barry who was a meta human was able to do something to trick her.

Oliver's pride was in pain and he needed to be stronger without becoming a metahuman or something, he just didn't know how. He had a lot of argues with diggle, felicity and the other as he decided to fight alone since now. The team got separated, except Felicity who was too much stubborn and wanted to keep an eye on him.

This night, Oliver as the Arrow was tracking Chien Na Wei from the former Triad. He knew her very well, and thought he stopped her several times, she always found a way to come back.This time he'll have to do things differently. Oliver sat in a roof corner at the Dock, where a business with Chien is about to happen. She was already here, standing near her car with several man by her side, nothing Oliver should worry about. She was waiting for someone.

" Felicity do you hear me ?" Oliver asked.

" Ooooh so, you need my help now ? I thought you told me 'if you wanna stay, fine but don't help ' " Felicity replied.

"Fine. See you later "

"WAAAAIT !! Ok i'll never understand you. Not that i ever did, but...."

" I couldn't find out who is the one Chien will meet tonight, and how many they will be to fight " Oliver cut her off

"Give me a second. I hope there will be enought guys to make you consider you'll need your team back ! "

Oliver ignored her sarcasm. Felicity was...Felicity and he got used to it.

"Oliver you hear me ?! Get out of there i suspect it's a trap ! She doesn't have any meeting with anyone !! " Felicity said, while Oliver jumped from the roof to start a fight with Chien's mens. "and of course...he goes right into it..." Felicity commented.

"Here's the Arrow ! Put him down ! " Chien yelled at her men who rushed to Oliver without any guns. Many other men came ouf from other hiding places, which prevented Oliver to focus on Chien. It took more times than expected to get rid of them all, but when Oliver finally punche the last guy, he felt something on his neck. A kind of sting and he fell down.

"Here's my gift for you. I owe you that" Chien said. Everything became blur for Oliver before he fainted. Once he openned his eyes, only 2min had past. Things were clear now, but couldn't believe what he was seeing. Chien Na Wei was standing, calling someone on her phone but...she was big !

"What's the hell had just happenned ?!" Oliver panicked.

" Yes i want you more of this now that we know it works. Oh i'll call you back he's awake".

Oliver aimed his arrow to the now giant chinese woman who smirked at him. " it's useless. You have been shrunk. What could you do possibly do now ? " She said, reminding Oliver how he felt about meta humans and mainly Supergirl, or any other aliens with God' powers.

What's next ?
1253212111.title: Let's shrink the Arrow

choices: ...i'm sure Felicity will take a good care of you. See you
12532121112.content:
"I can't kill you but i can hurt ! " Olivera said while trying to shot an arrow toward Chien's eye. But she was too hight for the arrow to reach it and fell down before her face level. The giant woman wanted to enjoy the whole situation, but she also didn't want to somehow loose her unique chance to killl the Vigilante once and for all. " i suppose it's time for you to die like a bug beneath my heel" she just said while raising her shoes over him.

" No way !! " Oliver yelled in anger. He was not going to die like this ! He took an explosive arrow and...something unexpected happenned as the woman was brutally pushed several feet away (from normal perspective) from another personn who suddenly appeared. Oliver didn't need to look up as he recognized the giant red boot standing next to him.

" I tried to hold back, i think she's not dead". Supergirl said then she looked down at the tiny figure who was Oliver. " i think the two words you are looking for are 'thank you' " she added.

Oliver put back his explosive arrow in his case and started to walk toward Star City. "Okayyyyy....Where are you going with your size ?"

" Find a way to fix my size. Felicity will call Ray palmer and he will probably find something. You can go home, thanks for your help" Oliver answered without a glance.

"Come on it will take you forever. I'm normal sized and i can fly. Is it so difficult to ask for help ?" Kara put a step ahead to catch up a tiny Oliver who finally stopped walking to look up at the giant blonde.

"Fine, if you bring me back to Felicity, then you promise me you go back to your Earth ? " Oliver asked.

Kara raised her right hand and replied " I swear ! Now shall we go ? ". She bent down and placed or openned palm in front of the tiny heroe. Oliver didn't like that but he walked into the giant kryptonian hand and sat down while Kara brought him to her face level.

" If i didn't know you, i would say you have a BIG problem with women." She joked.

" Not with women. Only with people with God's powers like you."

" That doesn't explain why you like Barry and not me.Well let''s go." Kara gently closed her hand before Oliver could answer, and flight away.

_____________________

" Oh my....Oliver get shrunk ?!" Felicity was shocked to see her ex-boyfriend dizzy in Kara's palm who put him in the desk.
"How did it happen ?! "

"Chien Na Wei had a sample of a shrinking virus or something. Another crazy thing that should not exist in our world anyway, but i know she is planning to get more. She was calling someone on the phone for that." Oliver explained.

"Kara did you bring the phone with you ? " Felicity asked.

" In fact...it's broken. I tried to hold back when i saved Oliver, but i still had too much strenght in my fist so when she fell on the ground, it broke the phone on the way." Kara admitted a bit ashamed, to Oliver's satisfaction.

" It's ok, we'll use another way and we'll stop them." Felicity said.

"We ?" Oliver asked. Felicity glared at him as she approached the tiny guy. " Listen to me. Nothing would have happenned if Diggle, Sara, Laurel, and Thea were with you ! So now, we'll fix your mess and you have no word to say to a woman of my size!"

Oliver looked up at Felicity's full height, she looked creepy but she was right, for now Oliver couldn't say a thing. So he changed the subject while turning back to Kara.

" Ok now i think it's time for you Kara to go back in your world. You promised remember ?"

"Oh i will...."
12532121112.title: Felicity called Supergirl

choices: Oliver hides somewhere, Alex is coming
Check the room for something, maybe Kara has a weakness he could use
125321211121.content:
"Oh i will but you coming with me " said Kara to Oliver's surprise. He looked at Felicity who nodded.

"What's the big idea ? I have nothing to do with your world or even you, except if there's something here to grow me back to my size."

"actually i think it would be easier to find a cure for your size when the team will get the shrinking product you've been infected by. Or else, i'm sure Ray could find something. But i don't want a tiny you being around trying to do what you always do : commands ! ' Felicity added.

" I think we should discuss about this in private.." Ollie tried to remain calm as he didn't want to annoy Felicity more than she was, as he really didn't want to go with Supergirl. But the girl of steel gently grabbed Ollie in her fist raising him to her face level.

"there's no need to talk, we are leaving now." She said happily like a child who just wanted to test a new toy, which annoyed Oliver who couldn't say anything as he could barely breath in her fist. Kara managed to put enought strenght to prevent him from talking, but not enought to hurt him.

"Thanks for your help Kara, i'll contact you when i'll have something." Felicity said.

"You're welcome, i wouldn't miss an opportunity to make Oliver spend some time with me. " Kara replied, then she activated the Multiverse portal and walked throught it.

Oliver didn't have time to realize what was happenning, when Kara openned her palm he landed on a table in Kara's living room.

"Welcome home Ollie ! I hope you like the place !" Kara exclaimed.

"great and now what ? Should i live in an hamster cage or something ? "

"No in fact you are totally free, it's not as if you could hide from my senses. You can even go back in your world if you manage to defeat me "

"defeat you ? And how's that possible ? " Oliver asked not sure to know where this was going.

" it's not possible. But you are free to try anytime you want." She laughed at him. Oliver knew how insignificant he was to this giant kryptonian, but she shouldn't underestimate him. That's what he was thinking on the moment at least.

"Oh and by the way my adoptive sister from the DEO has a list of criminal aliens in National city to stop, so if you wanna help..." Kara added sounding sarcastic.

"What are you doing ? Is that your goal to humiliate me ? You know i can do nothing with my current size ! " Ollie yelled.

" No i'm just treating you for what you are, just like you did it to me. I'm just an alien and you're just a tiny little hero "

"you know it's more complicate..." Olliver started when the girl of steel changed her clothes back to be Kara Danvers and took her phone to call her sister, ignoring him.

"Hey sis i'm back and i brought a little friend at home, so don't be shocked if you see him when you'll come back, see you !"

Turning back to Oliver, she said : "i have to go to Catco for a while, Alex will probably come to check what i was talking about, i suggest you to try to be nice with her. She may just be a big human for you, but she's a great fighter and can get mad easily."
Kara then rushed to the door ready to go " Oh by the way she doesn't like the Green Arrow. I told her all i knew about him, how he was cold, rude and killed some criminals before..so good luck ! " and with that, Kara closed the door leaving Oliver alone and with a big troule to come.

"Damn it Kara ! "

Next?

Standing on the table Oliver wondered what he could do, he knew even if he could get away from Kara he would then be trapped in another world never able to get back, and if he just sat where he was Alex would probably kill him when she eventually got here. Then he noticed something useful: Kara had left her phone on the kitchen counter in her rush to head into CatCo, that could give him some insight into Kara's life, maybe find some weakness to exploit or a way to get her to send him home sooner.

Firing a grapple arrow he managed to get himself up onto the counter easily enough, then stepped up over to the phone and unlocking it, finding a messenger chat still open, having been done in the last half hour. Oliver was actually surprised, even though he was being a dick to her and she was firing back quite well she was still trying to help and get him restored to his regular size as soon as possible, even if it was just to get him out of her hair. Plus other than the one or two every obvious moments of alien-ness it didn't feel like anything he wouldn't see if Felicity was IMing Cisco and Ray about a tech issue, in fact now he thought about it she probably did have a similar conversation with the relevant techies of their respective teams about him getting shrunk. It was a moment where she felt more 'human', probably because he didn't have to see her in her super suit, flying or throwing trucks like bowling balls so he could push that information to the back of his mind. Also the potential sex thing only worried him slightly rather than traumatised him, mainly due to Kara not actually being his sister, though without her being right there he could see some of her in the determined, courageous, bull headed 'Girl of Steel'

While he didn't get what he got up here to retrieve he did learn work was being done in both universes to try get him fixed, which was some 'small' comfort for the tiny vigilante. Now he just had to avoid the trigger happy, overprotective older sister (A position he on some level sympathised with, imagining that even if she wasn't some kind of party girl keeping Kara out of trouble was probably even harder than doing the same for Thea)

The one downside to his size and his attempt at information gathering is he put himself out in the open and only realised he was about to receive company when he hears someone...

12532121112121.content:
Someone unlocke the door revealing a long dark haired woman who was probably Kara's adoptive sister. That's what Oliver thought at first before he could see a Police badge tied to her belt and he knew from Kara that Alex was working with another organization called DEO. He sighed in relief. The giant cop looked down all around her and spotted the tiny figure of the Arrow.

"Hey little one. So it is true." Maggie said with a charming smile.

" Who are you ? " He asked cautiously.

"Maggie Sawyer. Detective of National City. And Alex's girlfriend." Maggie crossed her arms waiting for any reaction from the tiny vigilante.

" Glad she didn't come." he only replied.

"Yeah she received a call from Kara,and suspected the Green Arrow to be the 'tiny' friend she mentionned,so she choose to not come. She told me how much she hated you, for your way to make justice but also for how you have treated her beloved sister when you have meet Kara the first time"

" So i guess you came to convince Kara to let me go so you'll make sure Alex will never see me ? " Oliver asked hopefully. But another smile appeared on Maggie's face.

"Sorry but i came for the opposite thing. Even thought she doesn't want to see you, i'm going to bring you to her and see what's going to happen." Maggie said and walked toward Oliver who didn't have time to aim his bow at her, he was picked up in her soft hand and raised to her face.

" Put me down ! why are you doing that ?! " Oliver yelled trying to struggle in her fist.

" because i think it would be funny to see a shrunken man in the hands of my love, a man she doesn't like by the way. Maybe i could even place somewhere around her and let some bad situations for you coming by themselves". She laughed.

"You're sick ! I'll tell her everything you told me !" Oliver yelled. There was no way he would let a human girl putting him into a misery.

"Sure you can tell her. Who do you think she will believe ? Her cute girlfriend or the tiny diskiked vigilante ?"

Oliver truly started to worry. He wasn't sure if Kara purposly put him in this situation for some crazy reason, like to show him he was nothing at this size even for a human, or maybe he was only finding another reason to blame her, he didn't know what to think. Anyway right now, with Maggie he was going nowhere but...

Oliver didn't have time to do anything as he was picked up by two giant fingers of Maggie and placed in a wallet he could see from her other hand. She left him there, with some "giant" bills all around him, then trapped into the darkness as Maggie ziped the wallet pocket.

" i have no time for these games ! " Ollie tried to take his bow, but he was shaked as Maggie put her wallet inside her jean pocket. He was now totally unable to move, pressed against what was probably Maggie's thigh.

I'm in'' Mal and Aurora agreed ''I've lost one kid, hopefully getting you yours back will make me feel a little better'' she said before poofing her usual mage wear rather than the suit she'd been wearing a moment ago, while Ingrid smiled and poofed her Snow Queen outfit on herself (Something Emma was both happy and worried about, happy because she could see out and worried Regina would see her) before they were ushered into Regina's car (poofing in would tip Rumple off) Aurora was allowed to come as long as she remained in the car which she agreed to with a sigh.

A little while later they reached the pawnshop, Ingrid, Regina & Maleficent walked up to the door Ingrid freezing the hinges before Maleficent blasted them, the door lying on the ground at their feet. ''It wasn't locked'' Rumple said tiredly as the 3 mages stepped in ''I want my Elsa back'' Ingrid demanded ''Wow, you really didn't have a plan'' Regina retorted, causing Rumple to giggle ''Go away dearie, I have more important things to worry about than your family issues...'' ''like your own family issues?'' Maleficent offers, causing Gold to twitch slightly ''Actually yes, I'm going on a little trip. Now the curse is broken I can leave and find my son'' ''What if I help?'' Ingrid immediately offers surprising everyone ''I can come and go because I wasn't part of the curse, plus I've had over 20 years of experience in the land without magic, I could help you find your son, provided he's actually still alive...'' ''I already checked with a locator spell, he's alive and in New York'' ''Great, then I can help you get him and reunite, and you will give me back my baby girl'' Gold hmmed, pulling the scarf from his safe as well as his cane ''Okay dearie, you've got yourself a deal'' he answered, Ingrid smiled widely as with a flick of his wrist the urn appeared on the desk in a plume of red smoke ''Hey if you arses are going out of town, think you could find Lilith?'' everyone turned to the doorway as Aurora & Mulan (she was passing by and convinced her to come in) entered the shop ''If she's out there somewhere I know it would make Mal's year'' the dragon blushed while Regina & Mulan smirked in amusement.

Gold sighed slightly annoyed ''Fine, but we're not going on a wild goose chase, I'll give you the spell to check if she's even alive, as well as where she is'' He pulls a scroll from one of the drawers of his desk ''Now hurry up before Belle returns, she's trying to make me quit magic like Henry is with Regina'' Maleficent rolls her eyes before chanting ''Perdidit filium meum sanguinem, in me redire, deduc me in via ad finem lucis'' (Google Translated from English to Latin: Lost child of my blood, I pray for your return, Let the light guide me on the path to my goal) and they watched as a bright glow (meaning Lilith is alive) shone from...
125322111122212121.title: Regina & Mal agree to help Ingrid

1253221111222121212.content:
When the bright golden glow shone not from the map on Rumple's desk but Ingrid's cleavage the ice mage had only a moment to think ''Well shit'' before she was pressed up against the wall, staring into the angry eyes of a mother dragon ''You're hiding her from me'' she hissed in barely contained rage ''Not by design...'' Ingrid began ''.. neither of us knew she was your daughter, when I knew her in her previous life she was alone, I hadn't thought about who her new parents could even be. Besides if I'd known you were her mother don't you think I'd have told you already, not that you needed any convincing but there's no way you'd have said no to rescuing your grand daughter from Rumpelstiltskin'' Ingrid watches the older woman fold internally, then physically when Aurora wraps her arms around her thin waist ''She's alive, and now she's within reach love. We can be reunited once more'' she whispered into the dragon's ear, who purred in contentment, though that might have more to do with Mulan's fingers running up and down her spine.

''Fine, but I want to see my little girl, my Lilith'' Mal said quietly, stepping back slightly ''Little is right at the moment'' Ingrid mutters before reaching into her dress and pulling out Emma, gently placing her on the counter, the glow still surrounding her shrunken form. ''That's not possible'' Regina gasped when she recognised the blond on the table ''Emma's the child of the 2 idiots'' she mutters to herself angrily ''It would seem she isn't'' Maleficent says with a wide grin before stepping well into Emma's personal space, one of her long bony fingers running along her head ''Hello child, it's nice to see my Lilith all grown up even though it pains me to see how much I've missed out on'' she says all this lowly, unsure what level of noise could hurt the smaller woman's ears. There was something that bothered/confused both imp and queen ''You seem to be taking this very well Miss Swan...'' ''Technically it's Adaar Regina'' Maleficent interrupted ''Yes but just like Emma, she's been a Swan for most of hr life, so until she says otherwise it's the only thing I know she'll respond to'' Regina explains ''What did you want to know Regina?'' Emma asks, glad the mayor caused a distraction to get away from the dragon's pawing, though at least she could tell it was purely affectionate ''You seem to be taking it well that you're actually the daughter of the Dragon Queen and... what's this world's title for your quote unquote father, oh yes Sleeping Beauty. It took Henry a while to get you to even consider you were Snow and Shepard's sprog and I still wasn't sure you were actually convince and just wanted him to shut up'' Emma nodded ''You're right, I didn't believe him and I'm taking a wait and see approach to this. The fact of the matter is it' just as possible I'm Mal and Aurora's kid as I am Mary Margaret and David's, well they don't have a magic spell at seeks out blood relatives so I guess Team Sleeping Dragon are winning in that regard'' Emma smiled up at her possible parents, Mal trying to hide some hurt but Aurora and Mulan nodding in understanding.

''I have an idea'' the warrior announced with a grin ''What?'' ''Ms Swan I want you to smile, don't make it forced and fake, try make it real and genuine, thing of Henry, Ingrid, maybe even Elsa, just find some real happiness inside'' Emma was surprised by the request but had a go, her mind picturing her family all together, Henry trying to show Elsa how to play a game Regina had gotten him for his birthday, while Mal supervised, Aurora and Ingrid trying to prepare food for the lot of them, while Emma tried not get her ass kicked to badly by Mulan & Regina. ''There it is'' Emma opened her eyes and found both Mulan and Regina grinning while the others all had looks of confusion on their faces, even the newly arrived Belle who had been silenced until they could explain what was going on ''What?'' she asked ''It's her smile, You have Mal's hair and eyes...'' Regina begins ''...but aurora's cheek bones and smile'' Mulan finishes. ''I don't think that counts as conclusive proof but it works for you guys so what the Hell'' Emma laughs as she shrugs her shoulders ''So love, are we letting the kid out now?'' Emma asked, causing Ingrid to blink owlishly before practically leaping over to the urn containing the younger cryokinetic ''Let's do it then, full family reunion'' she says as she removes the lid, blue gloop pouring out of the container, slowly forming a humanoid shape before becoming more defined to that of a pale blond woman with expressive green eyes and a cute pout. The woman spins with a look of confusion at where she is , until she finds a teary eyed Ingrid staring at her ''Mother'' she calls and she is pulled into a tight hug as the older woman cried softly against her ''Oh Elsa, I finally have you again'' Ingrid says as she lets go and hold the ice mage at arm's length ''And guess what? I found your other mother'' Elsa's eyes widened, she'd heard stories from Ingrid about the blond mage who stole her mother's heart, and how they made her through True Love's magic ''Really, where is she?'' at this Elsa noticed her mother suddenly turn shy and awkward, wringing her hands ''You see there was some kind of incident...'' she began but stopped noticing something behind Elsa.

''Hi kiddo'' a small voice said behind her and Elsa turned, surprised to see a 5 inch woman in the cupped hands of an older blond woman in a suit, the ice mage noticing spiral horns almost completely hidden by a mix of her hair and the fedora, waving at her with a nervous smile ''Mama?'' Elsa squeaked and a memory flashed through Emma's mind, a small girl with frost coloured hair in her arms reaching up to her babbling for the most part but one word was legible 'mama'. ''Yes Elsa, mama's here'' the supposed saviour teared up as she was finally reunited with her daughter, now all grown up, and so was surprised when she was picked up from Mal's hands and pulled into a hug, Emma crushed against the cryo's chest. Mal laughed for a moment before getting the smaller girl's attention ''Hey darling, can you let your mama breathe and give nana a hug?'' the dragon grinned at the look of shock and then joy and filtered through the girl's big green eyes before she placed Emma on the table and flung herself at the dragon. Aurora and Mulan laughed while even Regina smiled at her best friend finally getting her happiness, her lovers and daughter, and now even a grandchild. Belle was practically gushing t how beautiful the whole thing was and while he wasn't going to show it Rumple was also happy to see a family reunited, it gave him hope he'd find and reunite with Baelfire soon enough.

So now what?
1)Emma decides to show Henry his family, even though it's definitely not the one he was hoping for
2)Emma has some family bonding time with her parents: Maleficent, Aurora and even Mulan, while Ingrid is in New York helping Rumple find his son.

Staring at her with interest were the bright green eyes of the dragon she'd just killed, Maleficent, apparently resurrection was easy for a dragon, or maybe they could just turn to ash at will Emma wasn't sure.

''Hello, little one'' Mal greeted with a smirk, Emma flinching when her face shifted: overall shape more angular, mouth now reaching just before her ears and eyes that were no longer green but twin abyss of black. She quickly shifted back, pointed tongue flicking across triangular teeth ''What to do with you? You are such a little morsel'' she joked with a scarily toothy grin 'Please don't kill me'' Emma pleaded, surprised to get a laugh from the larger woman ''Kill you? Where's the fun in that? No, I have no intention of killing you darling'' Mal answered her long tongue flicking out and slapping across Emma's face ''You do taste exquisite thought, surprised Regina hasn't already had a taste' Mal mussed, enjoying the look of fear (and very slight arousal) on Emma's little face.

It subsided after about a minute leaving a panting former saviour and a smiling dragon. ''What was that?'' 'Don't worry about it, the thought had crossed my mind but things are a little tense between everyone' she attempted to comfort the small blue haired boy 'So how did your friends and family grow?'

'Someone tried to kill Mom, they cast some kind of curse at her and she might have died but due to events that occurred way before my birth her bloodline was awakened fully and Grima doesn't die that easily...' Morgan stops when he hears Regina gasp 'Hmm?'

'You said Grima right? Of the shadow triad? Fell, Kaos and Cipher?' Regina asks

'Um probably, but in Plegia she's known as the dragon goddess, her bloodline producing the strongest and most beautiful mages and leaders in their county's history. Mom doesn't talk about it much but Aunt V and Tharja are practicing Grimleal so I learnt all this directly from them'

'So Grima's magic protected your mother and somehow grew all of the women in the area?'

'Yep, don't know what the witch that attacked mom was trying to do, Aversa wasn't exactly gentle with her after trying to kill her sister, plus Grima's power definitely supercharged her dark magic, there was a KABOOM and everything' Morgan finished

'Dark magic?' Regina asked, surprised such an innocent boy could talk about it so easily.

'Yep, Aversa and Tharja are practitioners, mom is a former practitioner since becoming Queen of Ylsie as they're wary of stuff like that, and my best friend is an apprentice of both her dark mage parents. It's just another school of magic back home, which I'm guessing it isn't over here, which is too bad as you have all the markers of a sorceress, and a Plegian too, you'd fit right in'

'I'd fit right in ay?' Regina seemed interested by the sound of that

'Yep you're a dark mage, tall and magically powerful, what was it Uncle Gregor called Aversa..... rocking tits was Gaius and that sounds bad, oh yeah the 'A Plegian ideal, the peak of fertility' which from what I can tell fits you too as if you were blond I'd think you were Aunt Aversa, well minus the Grimleal tattoo over her bosom but I can't see that part of you so maybe you have something there too'

Regina laughs 'You are a strange little boy with an even stranger world over the horizon. I wish I could see that place when this is all over. My curse was meant to be 1 part revenge to 10 parts fresh start but that's all gone to shit with the curse breaking' she grumbles the last part forgetting her size meant both boys heard her clearly Morgan sympathetic while Henry feeling guilty.

'Why don't you come back with me? You get a new beginning you always wanted, somewhere people will respect you and all the baggage can stay in this realm' Morgan suggested 'Henry could come too, it'd be nice to have someone my age around'

'I can't go, I can't leave Emma after all the time it took to find her and I don't want to abandon her like everyone else has' Henry answers sadly

'I'm afraid my decision will be similar thought it does sound like a wonderful option. I can't lose my son, not when I fought so hard to bring him back to me' Regina says as Morgan adopts a 'thinking face'

What's Morgan's idea?

1) 'Then Emma can come too' With the curse broken everyone Emma knew has been revealed to have never really existed... except Regina and Henry. Morgan suggests asking Emma if she would come with them, maybe have a chance to start a real family where there are no Evil Queens or Saviours to get in the way.
2) 'Anna could make a waypoint' When all this is over Morgan could get Anna to construct a portal linking FE to OUAT, allowing Regina to get her fresh start and Henry to keep Emma sane, while also alternating between both realities and therefore both of his mothers.
125322122111212.title: Regina finds them

choices: 'You guys are the only people I care about, of course I'll come'
'No, this is too much, just..... no'
1253221221112121.content:
'What if Emma comes too?' he suggests, getting surprised faces form both of them, even though Regina's was also tinged with amusement 'What?'

'You want mom to go to another reality with me and Regina forever after just getting her to believe magic is real?' Henry asked

'She thought magic wasn't real! What's wrong with this universe?'

Regina chuckles 'This world has a very weak magical aura, Storybrooke being the only exception. Magic just isn't a thing here' she explains

'Oh.... Well it still doesn't hurt to ask, besides whether she stays or goes she'll still only know you and Henry wherever you go' at the confused looks Morgan sighed (oddly enough like Aversa or Tharja when dealing with Chrom or Ylissians in general) before trying to explain 'Henry said the curse was memory based as well as what sounds like a time lock... don't give me that look the Grimleal Archives have some really intense stuff. Therefore everyone Emma knew here is a product of those false memories rather than the real person and with the curse broken they're reverting back to their previous attitudes and mannerisms, Mom is actually a good example, she gained a much more ruthless efficiency in her own fighting style when Aversa managed to restore some of her original memories. So Emma is probably now in a town full of strangers... and you guys, and this is probably me talking but choosing between a world of strangers and a town of strangers that look just like people you've known for over a year is no contest. Clean break if you will'

'Makes sense' Regina says after a few minutes, surprised how well thought out this apparently on the spot idea was.

'So Emma?' Regina chuckles when Henry tries to give her a puppy dog pout (Something she was sure the cute but stubborn blond taught him)

'I'll bring her here, much easier than causing more panic' she says as she sits down before with a flick of her wrist another cloud of smoke appears beside them

Meanwhile thousands of miles away..... just kidding. Wherever Emma is

Emma groaned as she sat in the background, head between her legs and praying nobody was looking for her: this day was the roller-coaster from Hell, first she thought Regina was finally calming the fuck down and understanding she wasn't trying to steal their kid from her, she even got desert which was always a bonus, but then Henry ate some and he fell into a coma, she tossed Regina around a little in a medical closet, found out the world was a lie, was nearly killed by a dragon she was pretty sure was also Regina's ex, killed said dragon with a fucking sword, her son 'died' then woke up when she kissed his forehead, accidentally broke a curse, and now she's stuck in a room with the people who abandoned her in another reality to come save their asses, plotting to kill Henry's mother who had suddenly become a super hot giantess, as well as expected to play happy families with her own mother as if nothing happened at all. She wished she could see even a hint of her friend in the pixie cut haired woman but there was nothing, just Queen Snow of the White Kingdom, enemy of the Evil Queen

'You alright there pup?' Emma tilted her head to see the currently only tolerable person in this room, at least Ruby had changed very little besides her mannerisms... okay Red was a Hell of a lot calmer than Ruby ever could be and she used canine terms like pup, pack, mate, and litter (that last one aimed at the brunette that came in when David summoned Mr. Gold and Mother Superior to assist them with dealing with Regina) but she could see Regina's curse did very little to change her personality.

'Why do you ask, Snow fishing again?'

'I was chosen as your godmother Emma, I'm allowed worry' Red smiles and Emma chuckles

'You do realise I'm older than you right?'

'Yeah, but that doesn't not make you part of my pack. I may not be your mate and I can smell you're not mine, but I can worry about you just as much until we find them' the lanky werewolf ruffles her hair affectionately, Emma smiling as she attempts to stop her... until she sighs and stands up, it seems the dwarves were tired of waiting and were trying to make a stand against Regina

'Oy stop right there!' she yells, standing in front of the newly forming mob

'Step aside sister, this is between us and the Queen. We need to take her down before she does something to destroy us once and for all' the leader of the mob, this time Leroy/Grumpy rather than Whale grunted as her tried stepping past her, but Emma wouldn't budge

'No, for one there is no chance of you guys doing anything against her right now considering all you have are pitchforks and rocks... I don't even want to know where you got them from. We need to take a deep breath ...' Emma was interrupted when she was taken in a plume of purple smoke, Ruby sneaking out in the confusion


'.... and calm the fuck down. Wait where am I?' Emma asks, turning repeatedly in a circle in confusion, Morgan trying to hold in the giggles while he looked up at Regina's grinning face and saw she was in agreement. It was this moment the witch found a reason to agree with Henry that Emma was like Supergirl, both were adorable blond puppies.

'Hey mom I think you broke her' Henry calls up, drawing everyone's attention to him as he was pulled into a hug by his birth mother

'HENRY! Oh I'm so glad to see you, I mean I knew Regina would never hurt you but I still worry' she rambled as she held him close, her mind skipping a side effect of her magic... one both Regina and Morgan were well aware of

'So magic affect's the body in that way over here too huh?' Morgan muses and Regina has to agree, Emma's chest had practically ballooned since this morning, and while not at Aversa's level or even Tharja or Robin's (of which Regina is part of), the young tactician guessed they were on par with his sister Lucina or not so secret crush Noire.... so still quite big.

'Yes, I'm actually surprised her shirt could survive that much rapid grow... hey wait a minute that's one of mine' Regina complained half heartedly, Morgan could tell there was no bite to them, like when Severa acts offended to something Lucina, Noire, Kjelle or himself says playfully. 'In all seriousness we need to get her to let go before she suffocates him' Regina says and Morgan nods in agreement 'Ms Swan!' she yells 'While I'm sure your breasts are quite impressive, I don't think our son needs to see them that closely'

That comment has the expected result, Emma immediately lets go with a bright red blush, while Henry falls to the ground drawing in lungful's of oxygen greedily, his face also red in a mix of embarrassment and asphyxia.

'So Emma darling, we have a proposition for you... well Morgan does' this draws the blond's eyes to the small blue haired boy in the strange but well made and maintained coat

'I'm listening'

'I'm sure you know how badly things are for Regina at the moment?' nod 'Well I need her help in shrinking the rest of my family, friends and my mom's friends and offered to take her back with me to stay when we were done. Plegia and to a lessor sense Ylisse would love a mage of Regina's calibre and without anyone from her old world she can get the real fresh start she wanted. The problem is that Regina won't leave without Henry and Henry won't leave without you. So to get to the pont of the argument, I'm inviting you to take a short trip to another world, with your son and Regina' Morgan explained

'Ugh kid, I don't know what you've heard but me and Regina don't exactly get along' Emma sighed, she had thought they were getting better but then the whole turnover of death incident happened

'True but would you have gotten into any fights with Regina if she hadn't have gone all protective mama bear? Is there anything about Regina that you have a problem with other than her over reaction to you being with her son?'

'No, Hell she's the kind of person I'd always wished would adopt me back then I was a kid, she's a wonderful mother to Henry, just a little bat sh.... little crazy at times' Emma corrects mid sentence, remembering there were kids present

'And if you weren't destined to break my curse and I reflexively lashed out in the hopes you'd leave, I'd have had no problem with you either' Regina admitted, surprising both Emma and Henry'

'So Emma, want to come with us to my world?'

[Note: If Emma says yes, can Ruby/Red come? She's probably one of the few people in town Emma can put up with right now, and it's a win-win for everyone, Emma gets her friend and Ruby gets to both leave Storybrooke and stay close to her pup]
1253221221112121.title: Morgan, Henry, Regina, Emma?

choices: Mad (when the awakening girls return to normal size Morgan &/or Henry shrink)
Happy (the awakening girls have learned to live as giants)
12532212211121211.content:
"Of course but-" Emma was about to say before Morgan interrupted her. "That's great, get everything you need I'll make the portal!" Only a second after he said that Morgan jumped off Regina headfirst. They looked down to see Morgan had made a portal which he fell into. "So what were about to say Mom? Henry said acting like nothing had happened. "Well I was going to say if Ruby could come as well." "I could work with that." Regina said, she snapped her fingers Ruby now sitting in her hand greedily munching on a donut. "What's going on?" Ruby asked (it sounded more muffle because she had a donut in her mouth) "Oh we're just leaving storybrooke forever." Henry casually said causing Ruby to just shrug as she continued to scarf down her donut.

In the Fire Emblem World

"How long has it been since Morgan left?" Severa asked lying on a hill next to her new girlfriend, Lucina. (She tried asking out Lucina and it was very successful) "About a day or so." Lucina replied, she then saw something fall from the sky conveniently landing in her bosom. The two girls sat up looking at Lucina's breasts when all of a sudden Morgan popped out. "Hey sis glad to see you!" Morgan said with a cheerful grin. "Morgan you're back, did you find a cure?" Lucina asked while Severa was silently offended Morgan didn't say hi to her. Morgan did a sort of half grin frown while awkwardly rubbing the back of his head. "Well technically 'no' but.." Severa interrupted the small boy by picking him up dangling upside down.

How is Severa feeling
12532212211121211.title: Possibly one of the coolest ways to make a portal

choices: Regina and the others gets introduced to the giant Sheperds
Noire swoops in to steal her best friend/new boytoy for a little while
125322122111212112.content:
The red head was smiling, something that surprised Morgan due to it's usual rarity 'Don't worry about it little guy, we've actually gotten used to the size while you were gone, Aversa and Tharja making a 'castle in the sands' as Noire called it on the edge of the border for us all to live, and once the mages get a growth spell to work on food we'll be fine, especially if our Plegian resident's cravings intensify. Better making giant steak than them eating the villagers like Grima used to in the Ylssian stories' Severa explains, leaning back against Lucina's bust as she pokes at Morgan, the little guy squirming cutely.

'Oh okay. Hey I sort of invited some people into our reality, think Mom will be okay? Most of them are normal sized but one is about Tharja or mom's height with Aversa's cup size' Morgan announces, hoping his new friends will be accepted by his old friends and family, especially after saying to Regina that she'd be treated better here than back in Storybrooke

'It should be fine, you're a great judge of character and...... she's a dark mage isn't she?' Lucina asks with a sigh Morgan always had a soft spot for those skilled in that school of magic, made obvious when you remember his favourite Shepherds are 3 practicing Grimleal witches.

'Um...yes' Morgan answers, Severa chuckles as she sees Lucina's eye roll out the corner of her own

'So when will they be here?'

Back in Storybrooke

'Everyone ready to go? Given how easily the portal was opened we should be able to return if we actually need anything but still' Regina asks, her 3 'passengers' sitting pretty in the palms of her hands.

'We're ready mom, let's go!' Henry cheers, Emma rolling her eyes as she wraps her arms around her son, Ruby giggling behind her as she links arms with Emma, pushing her perky chest into the blonde's spine, and her chin now resting on her unofficial cub's shoulder

Regina sighs before psyching herself up 'Now I'm unfamiliar with this branch of magic, so I have no idea how this will work' she says as confidently as she could, stepping gently into the area that contained the portal's magic, which flowed up her leg and enveloped the group in electric blue smoke, all of them feeling the tremors of crossing the dimensional barriers within their very being.


Henry came too in a position he had found himself in only a little while previous, with his head nestled between Emma's still expanding breasts. After some squirming and wriggling he managed to awaken Emma who loosened her grip enough for him to pull himself free and breathe fresh air, sweet apple scented air...ah crap

'Um mom, where are we?' her asked Emma who smiled

'Well kid I'm currently somewhere similar to where you were a second ago' her grin just grew as Henry tilted his head above Emma to see the bottom of Regina's jaw 'The good news is they're firm and just a perky as I imagined' Henry's cray of 'Mom!' had the former saviour laughing

'Finally awake my prince?' Regina's voice boomed in it's proximity startling him 'Oh and Miss Swan, I can hear everything' Henry noticed Emma gulp nervously 'Of course they're soft, firm and perky, they're that size because of my magical level, they don't sag for that same reason'

'Oh, well... good to know. Hey where's Ruby?' Emma asked, Regina's cleavage may be spacious but they'd notice a 3rd occupant

'Give me a moment' Regina answers, the duo bouncing a little as she breasts react to the movement of the rest of her body 'There we go' she says, dropping Ruby onto her breast, the were grinning drunkenly at the mother son duo

'Hey guys. Regina let me tell you your ass is a perfect 10, but these tits are at least 11star loveliness' she rubs the mound she was lying on affectionately 'You guys are so lucky' she grins

'Well enough admiring me, let's find Morgan' Regina announces, then she sniffs, her eyes glow and her nose twitches 'There he is'

'Wow I'm a wolf and my senses aren't that good' Ruby notes

'Well I am aware of his magical signature, he's just over there, not difficult for an accomplished mage' Regina explains/brags

'Oh can I try?' Emma sniffs around 'I've just got apples'

'That's me Ms Swan, given the fact you and Henry are nestled up to your shoulders in my cleavage, who else did you expect to sense?' Emma blushes in embarrassment

'Hey look, giant women and a little blue thing in a fancy coat, that them?' Ruby asks, acting as lookout for the other small people as they couldn't see much over Regina's blouse.

'Morgan is this your friend?' Lucina asks as she stands up, Severa reluctantly following with Morgan on her shoulder

'Yep. Hi Regina, where are the others? Morgan calls then asks, Regina smiling slightly before pointing to her breasts, Severa actually being the one to laugh before Morgan did

'Oh she's definitely a Plegian in the making, not just physically but the mind-set as well' she says, Lucina and Morgan both quietly agreeing with her, the others not sure what the redhead meant by it so couldn't comment

What now?
125322122111212112.title: Happy

choices: The group split upon generation lines
Robin leads them to their room
1253221221112121121.content:
'You should meet my mom, as well as the others too. I don't know about everyone but I'm sure you'll get along great with the Plegians' Morgan suggests hopping onto Lucina's shoulder and pointing out to the distance, gently tugging on her hair to get her to move

'I suppose, you ready?' Regina peeks down to her normal sized companions who nodded, Ruby crawling up to Regina's shoulder, sitting against her neck to watch the journey

The journey took about 20 minutes before there was anything worth seeing, but wow was it an impressive one. The castle was huge even by Regina's current scale, done tastefully with familiar feelings to her own castle in the enchanted forest. She listened to Ruby describing the sights as the duo were too deep in Regina's cleavage and covered by the witch's blouse, while Morgan chatted in her direction about how everyone was going to react to a new arrival while Severa was not so subtly staring at her with suspicion in her eyes, Lucina at least having the job of leading them to their home so was too busy to glare at her.

'Welcome Ms Mills and co, to the goddess palace, or at least that's the current title for the moment according to Aversa' Lucina waves her hand when they reach the entrance to the castle, the keeps walking through. 'Mother, Morgan's back and he brought company' she yells 'You stay here, we'll be right back with the others' she say to Regina, before the 2 FE giantess disappear within the castle

Regina sighs as she sits in one of the chairs she finds, removing Emma and Henry from her bra and placing them on her lap, Ruby sliding down her arm to join them

'You're really pretty' a cute, slightly high pitched voice says, Regina turned to see a short (compared to her) girl with blond hair and pointed ears, her chest barely covered but luckily there was little to cover 'I'm Nowi, who are you?'

'Regina Mills, I was invited to this world by Morgan...' Regina begins to elain but the girl bouncing around stops her

'Morgan's back! Yay!' Nowi cheers happily

'Now, now little one, calm down'

'Yes mother, act your age for once'

The group look behind Nowi to see an older looking woman with green hair along side a sullen looking red head with features similar to Nowi, who was currently pouting like the child she appeared to be.

'Nah Morgan's back, isn't that great?'

'For Noire maybe, my boyfriend didn't go into another dimension to get away from me' the red head snarked, a rabbit looking creature peaking out of her hair at the comment

'Did somebody mention me?' it asked, cooing when Nah picks him up and stokes him in her hands

'Well it appears you're already met the manaketes, good work' a wise sounding voice said with an audible smile. Regina turned and stood, scooping up the others as she did. The room was now host to a much larger group, but other than Lucina and Severa (as well as a couple people who bared slight resemblances to either) the rest were all strangers, though she could tell the woman wearing a cloak identical except scale to Morgan was A) the speaker and B) his mom. It was confirmed when her eyes caught a little blue on her bust which turned out to be a relaxed and smiling Morgan

'Hello everyone, I am Regina Mills, my companions are Henry, my son, Emma his birth mother, and Ruby a werewolf and friend of Emma's family' Regina greets, as well as gently placing the others on a table that Morgan had just been moved to (though he seemed less happy about it than Henry and co were).

'Hello Regina, I am Robin and I'm sure you already met my children, Morgan and Lucina. My son was telling me about your situation and I welcome you to our home' Robin smiled in greeting, and pulled Regina into a hug, Henry and Emma glad they'd been moved or else the collision of that much bounciness would, have been suffocating.

'Be nice to have another mage other than Tharja and golem' was muttered by the woman Regina noticed was taller than the rest and had a magical aura that felt like a mix of Rumple and Maleficent.

'Aversa behave' Robin hissed and Aversa just grinned widely 'You'll need to forgive my sister, she's not great with people'

Regina waves it off with a laugh 'It's fine Robin. I think we'll get along well, she reminds me of an old friend' she explains and Robin nods while Aversa smirks in amusement

'Anyway you've already met the manakete trio, Nowi, Tiki and Nah, the latter of which is the daughter of the first.... don't get me to explain manakete aging it confuses me' Robin points to the 3 dragon girls (well 2 dragon girls and one dragon lady)

'Next we have Sully, former knight of Ylisse, probably future when things calm down, and her daughter Kjelle'

'Sup bitch' the tomboyish red head greets with a smirk, while the turquoise haired girl nods politely, though Regina notices she has a surprisingly thin frame for someone at least partly wearing the armour of a high class knight of the kingdom

'Be glad she wasn't fully equipped when we grew, the doors wouldn't allow her girth then' a seductively dressed and dark aura'd woman teased, the white haired, bony-minus-boobs framed girl behind her blushed as all eyes focused on them

'Mother!' she hissed while Kjelle just shrugged

'She's right though, the shoulder pads in the armour is huge' she states with a much smoky/gravely voice than Regina expected

Robin sighs 'The snark fairy is my friend Tharja, her daughter Noire is the tall one trying to hide behind her mother' Robin supplied the names to Regina who nodded and they continued on 'Next we have my sister in law Lissa and her friend Marribelle' 2 blond women nod, Regina could see they were nobility though only the right one actually acted like it, the other behaving like a mix of idiot Snow and herself pre Daniel

'Then we have Cynthia and her mother Sumia' she pointed to an energetic looking girl and a light haired woman in white/pinkish armour

'Hello Miss Mills it's lovely to meet whoa!' Sumia greets but trips as she tries to shake her hand, being caught by Robin, Regina and Lucina, luckily before she could hit the ground or knock over the table the normal sized people were standing on'

'And that is why she's confined to the castle' a red head Regina knew instantly was Severa's mother commented, a woman with....rabbit ears? snorted, though whether it was amusement or a sign she was giving up was anyone's guess

'Ah there you guys are, glad you actually join us. This is Cordelia, Severa's mother, and Panne, the last female Taguel, or rabbit shifter' Cordelia nods while Panne sneer's baring her teeth at the strange woman

'Oh great, here we go again' the rabbit formerly in Nah's arms, now the table groaned

'Lastly we have Cherche, interestingly the only rider in our group whose mount grew with them, her wyvern Minerva is now the size of a true dragon. Personally I suspect it's due to the familiar bond but we just don't know' Robin shrugged while the pink haired girl smiled at Regina and the others

'A hem' a throat clearing drew everyone attention to the woman sitting in Regina's chair with a book in hand and stereotypical witch's hat on her head 'You forgot someone grandmaster'

'Oh shoot, this is Muriel, former chief researcher to Exalt Chrom, my husband' Robin introduces, the woman merely grunting from behind her book

'Now there are a lot of things that need doing so maybe we should send Henry off with Morgan and the kids to get a tour of the castle while we discuss how things will go from now on with you, Emma and Ruby. Though upon saying that, I don't know what the time difference between worlds is and you look a little tired Regina. Maybe we can find you guys a room to share and worry about the future tomorrow' the grandmaster/Queen offered, Regina turning to Emma who shrugged, leaving the decision up to her.

What happens now?
1253221221112121121.title: Introductions

choices: The citizens of Storybrooke want revenge on Regina, anyway they can!
12532212211121211212.content:
"I think it will be nice to get some rest so I'll take you up on that offer." Regina accepted scooping up her companions, placing them into her bosom and following Robin.

Robin had led them to a door where they could hear snoring from the other side. "We weren't planning on having you guys here so I hope you won't mind sharing a room with Olivia, she was taking a nap when you guys arrived and we didn't want to wake her, she is one the greatest dancers in the realm yet ironically surprisingly shy." Robin whispered slowly opening the door revealing two beds. On one of the beds was woman with long pink hair sleeping. Regina got herself settled into the bed but before she can nod off Henry spoke up. "Wait Mom we forgot to grab all of our clothes." "*YAWN* We'll worry about that tomorrow Mama needs some sleep." Regina yawned falling asleep, Henry and the girls falling asleep not that long afterwards.

WHAT THE FETCH HAPPENS NOW!

choices: Rumple just sends Snow and her group to the FE universe
He also sends a little 'surprise' to see what happens (Maleficent)
125322122111212112122.content:
A little while earlier

'David we need to do something now, before Regina kills more of us'

'Snow there's no evidence she's killed anyone else, she even left instead of killing us earlier' David argued with his wife, though even he was unsure what actually happened

Flashback

'Come on Ruby you can smell her out' Snow half asked, half order the werewolf, who took one look at her before laughing

'Snow, I'm doing what should have done years ago, I lost most of the few friends I had when I joined you on your hunt for revenge so now I'm staying out of this. Besides you don't need me to find Regina, she's a fucking giantess!' Ruby swore as she picks up her doughnut and stuffs it in her mouth, getting spirited away by magical means before she could say anything else.

End Flashback

Before Snow could go of on another rant, she heard a familiar light chuckle. Turning she saw Mr. Gold, starring out of the window with a smirk on his face

'What do you see Dark One?' she asks

'It's not what I see dearie, it's what I feel' he giggles 'Someone's playing with portals, yes indeed'

'Regina, she must be trying to leave us trapped in Storybrooke' Snow assumes, Rumple not having the heart to tell her Regina's world doesn't revolve around her.... okay he just couldn't be bothered having to explain it to her 'You will send us after her' she orders

'And why would I do that dearie?'

'Regina hurt you too, don't you want her to get punished for her crimes?' she asked, surprised when the man shrugged

'I have Belle, and she's not dead, why should I give a shit?' he asks, Belle lightly slapping his arm

'Rumple play nice' she scolds lightly

'Fine. Bring me some of the magic used and I'll send you wherever you want to go' she demanded, knowing the fairies were unable to assist in this regard so Snow and her ilk HAD to follow his orders if they wanted to get the portal open again 'Oh and for the record, Regina's gone' he adds, spurring the princess on as she yells at the dwarves to find the portal's location as well as the fairies to collect the magic.

'Will you be able to actually make the portal?' Belle asks when they leave 'After all you needed the curse to get us here'

'True love, but unlike here she's probably sent herself to a world that actually had magic, which I can make portals to fairly easily. I just need the magic to know exactly where I'm sending them' he explains, sitting on a nearby chair, waiting for the idiots to return.

It took a while but eventually they came back with a vial of strange, foreign magic, which Rumple pours out and performs several hand gestures to tear open a swirling portal in the air

'There you go dearies, good luck and don't argue with me if there are problems on the other side' he smirks

So what now?
125322122111212112122.title: Meanwhile, with the idiots

choices: Have them be eaten by the female Shepherds
1253221221112121121221.content:
After Snow and the people she chose to come with her went into the portal it Mr. Gold snickered a bit and decided to go make a sandwich with extra turkey.

Snow and the others landed and it seemed to remind her a lot of the enchanted forest, she would have to take time to explore it after she had gotten revenge. "Hello there you appear to be foreigners." Snow and the others had turned around to see several men wearing clothing that people probably would of worn in the enchanted forest (basically the male shepherds.) The one who had spoken was Chrom. "Yes I suppose we are, might I ask who you are?" David asked politely wanting to make sure his wife wouldn't piss anybody off. "I am prince Chrom of Ylisse and these are my shepherds." Chrom answered waving his hand towards the shepherds Kellam waving his wand (not that anyone saw him) "If you are a prince than what are you doing out here in the wilderness?" Snow asked David mentally face palming, slightly wondering why he left Katherine for Snow. "Well, we are here to visit our wives and daughters who due to a curse that happened they can't stay in the castle until the builders have finished renovating it."
