"No but what the curse did was turn them into giantesses here you and your group can come along on our visit." Chrom offered getting a nod in response.

Eventually they managed to reach the goddess castle's entrance where Morgan was. "Hey Dad!" Morgan said cheerfully hugging his father. "Hey there kiddo anything exciting?" "Yep, I actually brought some people into this reality, one of them is a giant like mom and sis, her names Regina!" At that Snow punched Morgan in the face with the force to give him a bloody nose. "You son of b!tch, you let the Evil Queen into your realm, we start with this boy here who let Regina escaped!" Snow shouted the others in her group shouting as well. "You are going to regret touching my son." Snow looked up to see Robin, Lucina, Aversa and a good portion of the other female shepherds giving a death stare to Snow and her group.

'But my nose itches' he whines, pouting cutely

Flashback

'MOM, MOM, MOM!' Henry yelled as he tried to shake her shoulder, it's size meaning he wasn't really doing anything, necessity negated embarrassment as he pulled himself up onto her chest and ran against one of her large breasts, yelling mom once again. He bounced off it as expected but this at least got a groan from nearby (whether it was Regina, Emma or even Ruby he didn't know) 'Mom Snow White arrived and she hit Morgan'

'WHAT!' Henry's landscape rotated 90 degrees, causing him to plummet and collide with Emma and Ruby in Regina's cleavage as she sat up, waking the other 2 in the process 'What did you say just happened?' she asked, plucking him from her breasts and bringing him up to her face

'Snow, Charming, Granny, Archie, the dwarves and some fairies came to this world and were outside the gates, something happened and she punched Morgan which set everybody off. Then she demanded they hand you over to her, preferably shrunken and they'd reward them by leaving. Grandma's gone nuts' Henry explains, not getting any further as he slips from Regina's fingers, bounced off her chest and landed between her thighs. The former mayor looked to be frozen in shock, until her hands and teeth clenched and she stood up, storming out of the room

'Oh dear, that won't end well' Henry turns to the woman they'd seen sleeping earlier, Olivia 'Hello, I'm O-Olivia' she stutters slightly

'I'm Henry, sorry about Mom, she's very protective of things she likes' he tries to explain, eyes drawn to her long pink hair being teased by the dancer's long fingers. He doesn't realise he was staring until he looks at her face and sees she's blushing a deep red

'You're staring quite hard little guy, I-I'm old enough to be your mother' she says with a blush

'Then you look good for your age, besides I know both my moms and Ruby are very good looking and I'm at the age I finally start noticing stuff like this' Henry apologizes

'Both... oh you're Plegian they have such interesting uses for magic these days. Sorry about that, yes your mother is quite delicious looking, her partner is so lucky' Olivia smiles lightly and Henry blinks. He wanted to deny some of her assumptions, but she was right in a sense, at the very least that Regina was practically Plegian if Morgan was anything to go on, Hell if they needed citizenship maybe that's where they'd get it. 'So should we follow her before she breaks something?' the dancer asks, lowering her cupped hands to Henry's level

'Yeah, best to get damage control out of the way and as close to him as possible' he grins as she picks him up and follows the brunette out and towards the main rooms

End Flashback

Calm down Regina, Snow and her minions got away, it's just 4 innocents they decided to leave with us' Aversa explains as Robin enters the room with their 'prisoners'

'Charming? Never thought the idiot clan would be separated, what happened to True Love and all that crap?'

'Seems she didn't like that I apologised for her. I don't know what's gotten into her'

'Regina' Granny called 'Did my Ruby go with you?' Regina nods and with a wave of her hand the lanky werewolf appears beside her 'Ruby! Oh my girl at least tell me before you go off to another world. Also lay off the drink you smell like a brewery' she scolds, causing Ruby to giggle

'Hey Regina, all that Cider is messing with your magic it seems' she teases, causing Regina to sigh annoyingly and retrieve Emma from her cleavage and drop her on the table too.

'Hey Archie, this as weird for you as it is for the rest of us?' she asks, trying to straighten out her clothes

1) Emma with David and then the meeting
2) Henry with the kids (giant and normal) while they try make Morgan feel better after getting punched and his worries about messing up by inviting Regina to their world

Robin asks after getting everyone seated at/on the round table Aversa had put into Tharja's 'War Room' (Something Robin would have questioned the necessity of before now.... if she'd had the time to do so). Blinking her draconic slitted eyes her forked tongue tasted the air, smiling at the sheer tonnage of magic she could feel around her. Waving her arm to conjure a version of her preferred dress and summon her staff, her senses touched against a familiar magical core and her eyes widened while her lips formed a grin, displaying pointed teeth: Regina! As Regina awakens she feels much warmer than before, sure this region seems to be a semi arid desert but something still felt off

'Helllo love' Maleficent hissed, taking Regina's earlobe between her teeth and nipping at it, her long fingers squeezing the Queen's mounds.

'Mal' Regina gasps, in a combination of aurosal, shock and nostalgia, having missed the older woman's prescience in her bed and her life in general. Turning her head she sees even when she's a giantess the dragon is noticeably larger than her in every way 'Don't play with those'

'Ah, worried about your passengers?' Maleficent asks, rolling Regina onto her back and straddling her, her large chest swaying above her head 'Don't, they're perfectly safe'

Regina couldn't help but roll her eyes, as a dragon Mal was a lot harder to injure or kill, meaning what she deamed safe probably wasn't for humans' Where?' she asks, causing Mal to grin

'Why, right in front of you of course' her grin widens when she sees realisation in Regina's eyes 'Was I wrong, did you want keep them for yourself, you always were posessive' she teases

Regina runs a finger along the swell of her bust, reminiscing on past encounters with the dragon's love pillows, then slides her hand between them and pulls out her traveling companions: Emma somehow still sleeping, though she was also wrapped around Henry like a strangler fig, the boy in question looking worried and finally Ruby looked at her with suspicion.

'Emma, unless you want Henry to die, you will wake up and let him breathe' Regina calls to the blond, who blinks sleepily and releases her grip on Henry, non verbally thanking his older mom as he gulps air greedily

'Fine. Everyone this is Mal, she and I...'

'We were lovers, Gina was very good at it by the way. Basically Emma was it, I'm the one before and technically current. I don't mind sharing my Queen though, I'm not as possessive as she is'

'Regina and I aren't together' Emma blurts out, surprised the dragon's smile actually widened

'Really? Well in that case' she lowers her body enough to knock Emma onto her back with her nipple, then leans down so the 2 blonds were almost face to face 'I think I'll take my chances with this lovely lady. So Emma, ever made a lady....' her flirting was cut short by Regina pushing her head into the brunette's cleavage, her sigh turning into a groan when Mal wriggles free and start actually sucking on the bouncy boob, smirking around it when she sees how it affects Emma and Ruby so deeply, Henry's blush was expected, given she was playing with his mother's chest

At the castle

Lissa yawns loudly, groaning as she pulls herself out of bed for her turn at guard duty, as well as grumbling at Robin's decision to have all the giantess take turn to guard the castle until they were finished construction and hired some actual guards. As her luck would have it she had just relieved Muriel when she sees a small mob of people approaching the castle. Sighing loudly she runs off to find Robin, the white haired woman snoring with Morgan snoozing in her bosom

'Fuck!' she swears in a whisper before pulling herself up 'Get the others I'll greet our new arrivals

With the idiots

'Hello dearies, what are you doing in my kingdom?' Robin asks, feeling the prescience of the other mages and giantess just behind her

Robin almost responded, but Snow's yelling was loud enough to be picked up by a specific pair of sensitive ears on a certain dragon, one which made herself known 'SNOW!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!' a thunderous growl echoed before a colossal fireball erupted between Robin and the group

'Mal, stop you can't just destroy everything because you're hurting' she tries to calm her beloved down but the dragon was too far gone at the moment

'Regina you don't understand, what she took from me, what she took from us' her teeth clench and a tear slides down her cheek but it wasn't until she see's Regina's 'Holy shit' expression she realised what she revealed

'It was mine? Ours?' Regina asks weakly, her arms wrapped tightly around her core

'Yes love, Lilith was yours. Your curse meant you couldn't carry, not that your mate couldn't' she smiled a little at this

'Why now, why not before?'

'You were blinded by pain, you wouldn't have been able to process the fact you had a child, that there was something more to that world than revenge. After they took her, it was too late anyway, no need to tell you anything' Regina hugged Mal and some of the younger girls 'aww'ed

Blue sneers 'And what can you simple beasts do against the White Queen?'

Tharja grins 'A lot' she clenches her fist and twists her wrist, the 'strongest fairy' collapsing to the ground, feeling like her insides were being cooked. The sorceress mercifully released the hex 'And that was just a taster' she grins maliciously

Snow grinds her teeth before replying 'This isn't over monsters, we will have Regina and we will destroy this den of dark magic users and villains, saving this world just as we did our own' with her speech finished the group disappeared in a cloud of fairy dust, Nowi sneezing cutely

Maleficent and Regina found Robin rather than her finding them, the taller blond looker more nervous than the brunette

'Robin, I require some help with trying to find our daughter. Think you or the others could be able to do that?' she asks much more timidly than she had been when she was confronting Snow

Regina squeezed her shoulder comfortingly 'Mal it'll be fine, Robin is a good person she should be able to help' she whispers while Robin appeared to be thinking

'I don't see why not, you do have a way to find her correct?' Robin asks with a sympathetic smile

'Yes, there's a ritual I know that should be able to do the trick, I'll just need more magic than myself and Regina to pull it off' Mal answers

'Okay then, we'll do it' Robin smiles before frowning 'Um, not to be a downer but do you know she's still alive?' Regina and Maleficent tense

'I, I don't know, but I think I'd feel it if she were dead, instincts or a connection to my only offspring' Mal replies, causing Robin to sigh

'I'm sure my sister knows a few spells that could confirm her survival, so you won't be aiming at nothing so to speak' she says calmly, trying not to anger the emotionally vulnerable powerhouse, or Regina

'Do it' Maleficent hisses, the white haired grandmaster nodded and fled to find the strongest magical beings in their group

A little while later

Aversa was able to find Maleficent and Regina's daughter with a little blood magic and some yellow quartz, it didn't tell them where the girl/woman (time flows differently between worlds) was but it gave them something for their magic to zone in on and tether itself to for the summoning ritual.

The symbols required had been carved into the floor by Mal and Tiki's claws, the others surprised by the manakate's knowledge of magical rituals even the darker ones like the one Maleficent was using, the only response they got from her was 'I wasn't Naga's servant my whole life' with a mischievous wink. Regina then had Robin, Aversa, Tharja, Nowi, and Tiki join herself and Mal at the points outside the circle marked by the larger symbols.

'Nos puer amisit, ut non reverteretur ad sinum matris eius erat ut destinatum est. Maria dimiserunt transire de re cito tutus receptus fuit.' exited Maleficent's mouth in a guttural, feral growl, the runes lit up as if being burned into the ground as everyone involved felt a sharp drain on their magic and a portal form in the centre

'That supposed to happen?' Nowi asks, having not been told much due to how much of a rush they had been to retrieve the girl

'Yep, that's a portal between worlds alright' Tharja says with a grin, despite her lower energy reserves (compared to the others) meaning this was a rather painful process for her

'Oh, okay, HEY LOOK SOMETHING COMING OUT!' the manakete squealed happily as a person (between Lucina and Tharja in terms of height) gently fell to the ground out of the portal, the only thing stopping both parents from running was the fact they knew exactly how badly this could go if they moved before the magic dissipated

The portal took it's sweet time closing (in some people's opinion) but it finally did, Mal and Regina rushing over the second it had faded, eager to finally meet the child they never had a chance to even hold.

But who did they summon/who's the new giantess in the castle?

(Between this chapter and the last one, Robin and the others have left the room to give the parents some privacy with their formerly lost child)

The girl the fell out of the portal was lithe and slightly bony though with the sizable bust of a powerful mage in their world, wrapped in silver and navy armour and a dark purple cape, her bare feet formed into reptilian claws, same with her hands, long bone white hair held back with a black hair band. Her large eyes were the same colour of Mal's, though they flashed purple similarly to Regina when she uses a large amount of her magic. Her legs shook and buckled, being this close to falling before Mal and Regina managed to catch her.

'There, there precious, we got you' Regina coos, seeing a lot of similarities between this woman and the 2 of them.

Maleficent gives a watery smile, running her fingers along Corrin's cheek 'My sweet baby girl, all grown up' she sniffles as Corrin's eyes open slowly, eyes widening in shock as her gaze meets Mal's

'Mama?' she squeaks, shocking the dragon as she didn't think the girl would recognise anything about her as she had not even hatched when Snow and Charming had stolen her away

'Yes baby, Mama's here, and so is mommy' she sniffles and turns Corrin's attention so she can see Regina too

'2 moms? Ha ha, just when I thought I'd seen every strange thing I was part of. Can you turn into dragons too?' she asks in mild amusement

'I can change into a dragon yes, but Mal's an actual dragon' Regina answers, smiling as she nuzzles her lover 'My DragonQueen' she grins widely, a gesture that is mirrored by Corrin

'I like this' she mumbles, but both mages notice as she pulls herself to a standing position 'I never felt like I belonged, not in Hoshido, nor the dark world of Nohr, but I've been here for like 5 minutes and I already feel like I belong here with you rather than back there' she grins ear to ear, wrapping her arms around their necks in a hug.

Regina tenses, after nearly a year of her last child hating every moment he was nearby, she was worried Corrin would hate her too, for the darkness inside her that she could feel in the girls magic that was there because of her and Maleficent. Luckily her dragon ran her fingers along her spine in a comforting manner, trying to help her understand this was a fresh start for them all, they had a chance with their child once more.

Emma shuffled her feet awkwardly 'Kid, this is all so much and I... I just can't do this. I'm sorry but it's just to crazy' she turns to leave but a pulse of magical energy knocks them all to the ground. When they all right themselves Regina notices Morgan's guilty expression, as well as the magical bubble forming around them

'What did you do?' Regina asks, to which the tactician looks more guilty and worried

'I, I thought she'd say yes, so I activated the components for the transport ritual once you summoned her. I didn't think she'd actually say no' Morgan answered, hands fidgeting wildly

'Well turn this bubble around kid' Emma argues but Morgan shakes his head 'Why not?' she asks, getting more annoyed

'BECAUSE I DON'T KNOW HOW!' Morgan yells back ' I'm still a novice, the only reason I got such an important mission was because there was nobody else' he teared up and began to cry, Regina picking him up and cradling him to her bosom.

'Don't worry Morgan, I know you didn't do it to be a bad guy, you're just overly enthusiastic' Regina comforts the boy who sniffles

'Really?'

'Of course. Now how does this work?'

'The bubble is a safety feature, it's so the void can't harm you when you world jump. Once it has enough power gathered we'll be sent away' Morgan explains as it turns a deep shade of blue 'And it's done' he announces as the ground shakes and features of things around them begin to blur

'Everyone to me' Regina orders, using her larger form to keep the other 3 held protectively close to her core, Henry now finding himself pressed between both of his moms impressive racks while Morgan being more to the side just pulled himself close to Emma's side, though Regina's embrace would probably be enough

"Morgan got stood up and looked around a bit before giving a major grin. "This is my world, thank goodness we didn't get lost!" Morgan said cheerfully that grin getting even wider when he realized this was incredibly close to the location where the female shepherds became giants. "Oh thank Naga and Grima okay you guys this is where my family and friends all became giants, I'm gonna go over and tell them you can bring them back to normal, Regina I'll need you to go back to normal size unless if you were born a giant." Morgan explained quickly before he ran off Regina's stomach to where shepherds were.

"Mom, Lucina, Aunt Aversa, everyone I'm back!" Morgan said as he dashed right in where all the female shepherds were. Morgan was soon scooped up and pressed into lips "Oh my precious baby boy you're back, we've missed you so much!" Robin said after she stopped kissing her son. "I have good news mom, I was able to find someone to bring back into our reality to fix you and the others." Morgan said bouncing up and down, Robin giving a large grin. "Everyone, Morgan has returned and brought back a way to bring us back to normal!" Robin shouted getting everyone who hadn't seen Morgan's attention.

All of female shepherds followed Morgan to where they saw Henry and a normal sized Regina (Emma having left into a different part of the forest to clear her head.) "So you must be Regina and Henry now before you cast any spell I thank you for being able to do this." Robin thanked getting a smile from Regina.

There was soon a large cloud of purple dust that enveloped the area, when it cleared all of the shepherd girls were at their original size. "Where's Morgan!?" Robin shouted immediately noticing the absence of her son, "Henry where are you!?" Regina shouted as well, "Huh, I shrunk all nothing new." Robin heard looking down at the ground she saw Morgan an inch tall standing there. Regina saw her own son but his reaction was not so good. "Please change back please change back" Henry pleaded Regina wordlessly placing a growth spell on the two boys but sadly with no success, each of the spell casting females tried as well but none succeeded.

"This can't be happening I can't live like this there has to be something!?" Henry started crying he didn't want to be tiny forever. Regina picked up Henry in cupped hands and walked over to Robin. "Robin I'm so sorry about your son, please forgive me." Regina said, Robin chuckling a bit waving her off. "It's fine, you can ask Morgan yourself." Regina looked down to see Morgan cuddled up in Robin's bosom smiling, "Don't worry its fine, besides I was actually born tiny but mom wanted me to live a normal life so she placed growth spells on me and occasionally they would be reversed so I can play, besides I never felt very comfortable ring normal sized so I'm actually happy about this." Morgan said before disappearing into Robin's cleavage. "You see all good, you should worry more about your own kid, he doesn't look too good," Robin said pointing to Regina's hand where Henry was still crying with head in between his knees.

12532212211121212112.content:
'Robin we need to talk' Regina calls as she walks into the tent, Robin sighs and pushes Morgan deeper, out of sight.

'Yes Regina, and may I ask where Henry is now?'

'With Emma'

'Is that wise?' the grandmaster asked, having seen the blond woman wasn't coping well with the trip any more than their son was with his new size

'She's his mother, she would never hurt him... intentionally' Regina defended, tacking on the last part as she knew the woman was a little oblivious and clumsy at times

'if you're sure. So why have you come to me?'

'I need you to open a portal back home, you guys have it covered over here with research but I have my own resources too. If you send us back I can search through my own archives, as well as Maleficent's and possibly search through Rumples without him knowing to try find a growth spell/curse/potion that will affect them. This would also benefit you if Morgan ever wants to be normal human sized, such as for a lady friend when he's older' Regina smirks as Robin rolls her eyes with a blush on her cheeks

'Okay Regina, give me a few minutes to set up the materials, go get Emma and Henry then we can send you over' Robin agrees, going over to her spell books and peering through them. Regina nods and goes back to get her little family ready to leave.

'Okay, everyone ready?' Robin asks as her and Aversa had finished setting up the ritual circle and seating the 2 (and a bit) world jumpers in the very centre

'Yep, ready whenever you are' Regina answers, Emma pulling herself closer and Henry sits in their linked hands

'Jigoku no mon, aite jibun no sekai ni watashitachi no ryokō-sha o kaesu' Aversa and Robin chanted, as the runes glowed the colours of the rainbow before the entire circle flashed a blinding white

'Whelp they're gone, I'll head off to the archives, going to check if the Ylsians have any size based spells?'

'Yeah, probably the best option, there's no way they'd let you in there' Robin teases with a slight smirk on her face

So what happened to our OUAT guys?

1) Everything went perfectly fine, the duo look for something to help Henry
2) As a side effect of the lingering magic of both Regina's size changing and the failed growth spells used on Henry, on arrival one of them is now a giantess and the other remains the same (luckily Henry is on their person rather than the giantess or he'd never be found)

1253221221112121212.content:
Regina had found herself a quiet part of the forest and sat by a tree, gently rubbing Henry with her thumbs as he lay within her cupped hands, his cries lessoned to slight whimpers and sniffles in the comfort of his mom as well as the sweet apple scent that had calmed him his entire life. The problem for him was the new change in their size differences, she was even bigger now in comparison than back in Storybrooke, he was practically a bug, both to her and to everyone else.

There was no way they were going back with him this size, he knew his moms would be really careful but the fact he could be so easily smushed scared him, as well as the thought of just how clumsy Emma could be at times... he really didn't want to be a bloody smear on Emma's ass or ballooning bosom, nor squished between Regina's toes just because his mom walked around the house barefooted (High Heels, good for business and making short people look taller, not pleasant for long periods)

'Henry?' Regina calls quietly, hoping not to scare him as he looks up to her

'I'm scared mom' he replies weakly, breaking his mom's heart as she knew just how headstrong and stubborn he could be (he got it from both of his moms) 'I don't want to die' he whimpered, Regina responding by pulling him up to her face and laying a gentle kiss on his tiny body

'Don't worry Henry, momma will keep you safe... Emma too I suppose' she jokes before pulling him into a comforting embrace and swaying, Henry happy to feel so much love an affection from his colder/stiffer parent, though made a conscious effort to forget that she'd just inadvertently rubbed him against her nipples (Whoops)

'REGINA!' Yelling broke their moment together as both heard Emma calling for her. Sighing she closed her hands around Henry before yelling back

'Over here Emma', not needing to wait long before a slightly grumpy blond showed up beside her. She wondered what has brought her to the former mayor's personal space... oh well it's not like she doesn't enjoy it, both from their mixing magic and also just because he banter is fun

'Regina, I came back looking for you and this really tall blond chick said there had been an issue and that you were out meditating or something. What happened?' Emma demanded answers as she sits down beside the brunette, Regina biting her lip before slowly moving her cupped hands to Emma's eye level

'Please don't over react or panic, I just got things calm' she whispered before opening her hands, Henry looking up at the shocked-to-silence face of his now humungous birth mother

'Henry?'

'Hi Emma' he waves

'How?' her eyes flick between Regina and Henry, hoping one of them will tell her something

Regina sighs 'Technically it's my fault, I did what Morgan brought me here to do, shrink the women in his life back to their normal heights, and in the process it shrunk both Morgan and Henry to tiny size. Like I said I just got Henry to calm down, but he's worried he'll be crushed and die very easily'

Before Emma can say anything in response one of the Shepherds arrive to speak to them... but who is it?
1253221221112121212.title: Henry's growing family

12532212211121212121.content:
Seeing a pale woman with a dark aura and dressed in what Regina could only describe as 'harem wear' approach them Regina reluctantly pulled herself up, Emma following quickly behind her

'Hello prescious, you're Regina and Emma right? The girls with the new tiny cutie' her voice was husky and seductive and her face twisted into a smirk automatically

'Yes, what do you want?' Regina asked defensively

'First some advice on tiny travel, you've both got the Plegian figure so I recommend using those assets to carry your kid around safely. The other is to open a portal so you can try find something to help the kid on your end while we work on this end. Don't worry, we'll contact you immediately if we find ANYTHING' she stresses the last word, giving Regina a slight comfort

'Okay then. Ms Swan...' Regina calls her blond companion '...if you could undo a couple buttons please we can keep Henry safe and sound until we get back to Storybrooke' Emma and Henry were both shocked by Regina's decision

'Are you sure about this Regina?'/'You're kidding right mom'

'Yes I am, and you said you were afraid of being crushed, well my bosom will keep you nice and safe, as well as close to my heart. Also Emma I know you're going to complain, but remember you're still getting used to your new assets, and I don't want to hear about you falling while doing your sheriffing, and get up with blood soaked cleavage'

Emma sighs before compliying with the brunette, opening the buttons (and enjoying some not at all subtle leering of Regina's lovely breasts) before bringing her hands up and letting Henry drop in. Some slight adjustments later and he was poking his head out of her cleavage

'Are we seriously dong this?' he asks, straining his neck to try look Regina in the eye

'Yes Henry, now time to disappear until we're all back home' she whispers while buttoning back her shirt, despite Henry's muffled protests. It was at this point she realised Emma was still staring, with a wide grin on her face 'Give em a good squeeze, it's subtler' she deadpans, causing Emma to snap out of it with a blush. She tries to stutter an apology but Regina just laughs 'If I had a problem with it you'd have known by now, it's fine'

'A hem' Tharja coughs bring attention back to her 'Now shall we begin the trip home?' she asks, retrieving an important component from each

'OW' they yelled as she yanked some hairs out

'There we are. Portals like these if they have any kind of accuracy need something from the target universe, which means you can always go home, as your magic resonates with that world. I've never been there so the hairs are my tracker' she explains, putting all the hairs into a glass vial. If anyone bar Tharja noticed the glow when they met, they didn't comment on the hairs. 'Now the best place is the castles ritual room, so if you'll follow me we can get this started'


Despite herself Regina was impressed by the Plegian's set up, much more apparatus and references than her own vault, Emma was just amused and confused

'So how do we leave?' she finally asks

'Like this Sorera o ie ni okutte kudasai!' Tharja chants, thick black smoke engulfing them both, which when it cleared left them in the kitchen of Regina's mansion

'Well we're home' Regina states, fishing Henry out of her cleavage before depositing him onto the table

'Okay then, I guess I'll be going' Emma mutters before turning to walk out the door

'Wait!' Regina calls back 'Given Henry's new condition maybe it's best we stay together, at least for the moment. Don't worry about space, this place has 3 spare bedrooms, and failing that you can always snuggle up to me in my room just like Henry will' she smiles flirtily and Emma grins back

'Really, thanks Regina' she kisses her cheek and then leaves to grab some of her stuff

Regina grins widely, Emma had shown affection, something she knew didn't come easy to the woman.

Well here we are, the gang's back in Storybrooke, but they don't know Henry's invulnerable at the moment, but they will. So which of Henry's nightmare scenarios shows him/his moms that he's indestructible?

The ones involving Emma, or the one involving Regina?

"Oh Regina I need to talk to you." The women turned around seeing Robin walking towards them. "Yes Robin?" Regina asked walking toward the other queen. "I want you and Emma, to come with me to the Grimleal archives so we can have an easier time trying find a cure for Henry." Robin said but before Regina could answer Emma interjected. "Wait what about Morgan? Doesn't he also need the cure?" "Well, Morgan says he's happier tiny and the cure would make it so he's never tiny again." Robin explained getting a nod of understanding. "Sure I'll come with you, anything for Henry to be cured, although speaking of Morgan where is he?" Regina asked tilting her head. Robin explained (Lucina counting as plegian since her mother is one)

Time skip to when they get to the Archive

"Okay, Noire and Severa you two are on lookout in case if anyone decides to come here. Lucina you take care of Morgan and Henry while the rest of us try and see if we can find anything to cure Henry." Robin said everyone nodding.

Lucina had found a nice quiet place where she deposited Morgan and Henry onto a table. "Morgan how are you not scared of being tiny?" Henry asked in confusion slightly freaking out. "Well I was born this way and a part of being born tiny I'm basically indestructible. You don't need to worry about anything Henry it's all gonna be okay." Morgan comforted, although Henry decided to hear it his own way. "Yeah right, you're not indestructible, you are just as scared as I am but you're just trying to look tough I bet they already have a cure set aside for you once I leave so you won't end up looking like a scared little baby, but I won't have it you condescending prick!" Henry was in a blind rage of fear and frustration and pushed Morgan off the table, Lucina unable to catch her brother as he hit the floor.

"OW! well nothing's broken but I can't move because I'm in immense pain." Morgan said moaning a bit on pain. Lucina gasped gently picking Morgan up and softly kissed him before sliding her brother into her cleavage.

"You!" Lucina turned around staring daggers at Henry "you pushed my brother off a table, while I'm not allowed to punish you, I can however bring you to someone who is!" Lucina shouted tightly gripping Henry in her hand before running to where the adults were.

Lucina slammed open the door and marched to where Regina was standing and dropped Henry. "You're brat of a son pushed my little brother off a table!" Lucina said everyone now looking at Henry. "Henry is this true?" Regina asked "Yes it is and I"

125322122111212121221.content:
'... I'm sorry I did it, I sigh, I got annoyed he was being so calm and smirky I thought he was mocking me for being a baby and being worried I'd get crushed while he just sat there grinning' Henry felt bad for hurting the other boy, he just reacted and lashed out in anger and stress at his new/current size

'Oh Henry' Regina sighed, she had worried about this during her and Emma's many clashes, hoping against both nature and nurture he wouldn't have their anger management issues and tendencies. She then turns to Robin who was examining Morgan 'Will he be okay?'

'Yeah he'll be fine, like he said he's practically indestructible, it's just the fall was sore. He'll be fine in a little while' she answers before sliding Morgan into her cleavage.

Henry sighed in relief, though the feeling was shot lived as about 5 heavy books landed ontop of his shrunken form, shortly followed by Emma flopping into the nearby chair and restin gher head against the pile (being too big to lean on) 'Damn, why do magical books all have to be the weight of car tires, and why did nobody help?' she grumbled her question as Aversa chuckles behind her.

'Henry!' Regina yells, pushing Emma over before lifting and slightly moving the stack, revealing Henry looking only slightly worse for wear, not a blood smear on eh table and book

'Ow'

'Holy shit kid I didn't see you there. Are you alright, why are you here and not with Lucina?'

'Your son decided to push Morgan off a table, and now he's been flattened by books. Good work Emma' Regina says sarcastically, then pulls down her top to secure Henry within her own cleavage, Emma blushing and turning away while she does so. Once he was secure Regina pulled it back up and tapped Emma ont he shoulder 'Emma, while what you did hurt him it was obviously an accident. Just don't do it again' the hissed the last part causing Emma to nod her head violently 'Good' Regina almost chipper, kissing Emma's temple before grabbing the book at the top of the pile 'Off to work Swan, these books won't read themselves'

6 hours later they'd emptied the entire library/archives of relevant books and...
125322122111212121221.title: Karma... I think

1253221221112122.content:
Morgan was thinking a bit before he got a lightbulb his finger pointing up like it often does with Henry (the fire emblem one) "I got it, stay right here I need to go talk to someone!" Morgan says running off into the woods.

"Man this is boring when will Morgan get back with that stupid cure, I'm already missing some customers in Fates." The Anna who ran the outrealms gate groaned before seeing Morgan run toward her. "Morgan your here did you get the cure?" Anna asked with a twinkle in her eyes ready to get this stupid thing over with. "Actually no, but I need you to make a permanent outrealm gate to link this dimension and ours." Morgan told to Anna. "Listen shorty, just because I look over the outrealm gates doesn't mean I can make them." Anna replied to the boy, "Well I know your boss and he can make a link to it if your too lazy to do it yourself, I know Sans gave you the ability to do that." Morgan replied to the nervous Anna, despite her boss being lazy he was someone who's bad side if you got on meant that your life was going to be a living H E double hockey stick. "hey, did I hear my name called?" Morgan and Anna turned to see Sans, who was extremely pale, had white hair and blue eyes wearing a blue jacket. "sup morgan, I just dropped my kid off at the babysitters and I heard through the grapevine I was needed." "Sans, I need you to make a link between this dimension and mine, please". "Sure can do but only because you remembered to use please not many people do that now a days. I'll go and set it up." And with that Sans left

Somewhere between dimensions

"Hey Scales did you know that you, Grima and I are a know as the shadow triad?" "Yeah, did you just find that out?" "Yeah but what bothers me is that I don't even use dark magic, heck I don't even know if my abilities even count as magic! Humans are stupid" "Not all humans are stupid Bill, remember your 'death' was cause by two kids after all." "Don't remind me"

Back to the OUAT dimension

Regina was sitting with Henry just simply chatting when they saw Morgan running incredibly fast towards them. "Guys, guys, I had a talk with this pretty powerful person I know and he's making a link between this world and my own!" Morgan said victoriously, "That's great how long will it take?" Regina asked happy to be able to start her life anew. "I believe it will take about...."
1253221221112122.title: "Anna, I know your boss"

choices: ''You're world is fucked, I think I'll keep you myself''
Regina preforms her good dead for the year and helps Morgan
12532212211122.content:
The 2 boys trekked through the forest, Morgan actually jumping ahead and leading Henry after a few minutes

'Hey, where are you going?' he called

'You can't feel that? The magic' Morgan asked in confusion

'No, this place doesn't have magic, at least not normally' Henry answered, causing Morgan to pout

'Really? That sucks. But still there are a few sources of really powerful magic within the area this town occupies, one which isn't moving...'

'Which must be the vault' Henry guessed, getting a nod from the young mage

'Correct and the other one... well that's weird'

'What? What happened?'

'I was going to say the other one is moving around so must be a person but it's disappeared, which is strange as something that big shouldn't be able to just vanish' Morgan ran his fingers through his blue lock before smiling 'There it is.. oh dear' he meeps as a thick purple cloud fills the clearing

Henry looks about ready to run when he feels Morgan grab his arm and a chill runs through his spine, turning to argue he finds nothing, then when he looks down on himself... there was nothing there either

'Shh' Morgan hissed as the magic dissipates and Regina steps out of it, looking as pristine as ever minus some blood on her heels, Morgan being reminded of Tharja just before he'd been sent across dimensions 'Wow' he whispers 'You didn't tell me there was a sorceress in the town. Why didn't we just go to her?' he asks curious

'That's my mom, Regina the Evil Queen' Henry answers, feeling a little guilty for using all her titles 'What do you mean a sorceress?'

'Back home using a lot of dark magic causes red or purple eyes, Aunt Tharja and 'Versa, Uncle Henry even Mom pre-amnesia did a lot of dabbling, mom and V a lot more than that seeing as their affinity cards rot from the touch. A sorcerer/sorceress is an even stronger dark mage' Morgan explains quietly so as not to attract attention... not that it did any good as Regina's still bright purple eyes seemed to lock onto them and with a wave of her hand they were visible again.

'Henry?' She asks confused as she crouches down to see the boys 'How did you get out, the protection spell on the vault should have been impenetrable'

'That would be me' Morgan volunteers 'Hi, I'm Morgan from what my friend calls the FE dimension, I nabbed Henry mid flight because I need help'

Regina's eyebrow raised before her once more brown eyes met her son's 'Henry, what do you think?'

'He's telling the truth mom' Henry answers, he may still be mad at all the lying but the scare from thinking she was going to be killed reminded him he still loved her, she was still and would always be his mom 'Please help him' he pleaded

Regina sighs 'Okay let's here this story, then I'm going to get you somewhere safe kiddo, most of the idiots scattered after some white haired chick appeared and grabbed Emma. At least Ruby's useful in that the wolf is searching for either scent' she mutters the last part but noticed Morgan stiffen 'Something wrong little one?' she asks feeling bad for the little cutie

'The woman, did she have a bow, short white hair held with a headband and um a large... chest?' he asked with a deep blush on his face.

Regina looked surprised at the description 'Actually yes'

'Naga's testicle' he mutters angrily and Regina feels the need to reprimand, assuming it was some kind of swear while Henry is a mix of worried and confused 'Okay I'm from a kingdom called Ylisse, though through my mom I'm technically a prince of Plegia because of Grima's brand on my spine like mom has on her hand and aunt V has just below her ribs. Anyway a witch from another kingdom known as Valm arrived and cast a curse on my mom trying to bend her to her kingdom's will. What she didn't expect was for it to activate Grima's magic, and mom expanded to ... probably just shy of twice your height' Morgan explains, his mind stuck in the memories

Robin falls to her knees as the toxic green coloured magic filled her body, her pain filled grimace comparable to being burned from the inside out, just when it seemed the sorceress was victorious something snapped and a thick pink/purple smoke covered the queen and spread out, a faint cackling sounded from within that only grew louder with each passing moment. When the smoke cleared Robin was unharmed and HUGE, but that was not all: her snow white hair which was originally shoulder length now reached her behind, her light smile was now feral with pointed teeth and her eyes... all 6 were blood red and practically slits

'I LIVE AGAIN!' she hissed a long tongue slipping past her thin lips as she grinned then looked down to the little witch who tried to control her 'GOODBYE LITTLE BUG' she hissed before her tongue shot out and wrapped itself around her, the Vallise screamed as she was pulled back into the gapping maw, but not for long as blade like teeth made short work of her unarmoured flesh.

'The witch had awoken Plegia's dark goddess and she started to turn and corrupt most of the other females in our former group. Some she kept at normal size to function more subtly in places she couldn't, such as that girl, my friend Noire' Morgan sighed 'Whatever reason Noire has taken Emma it's definitely for my mother's bidding, Grima wants something and if needed she will come here looking for it'

'Okay so dragon demon giantess from another reality possibly trying to get into Storybrooke. Why come to me, there are other magic users here and I'm not a good person' Regina asks, her heart twisting at the boys story, though she was confused by his amused chuckle

'I was right' he grinned 'You are just like Aunt V, only the hair colour is different. Same magic, same 'body type', same outlook on themselves, all identical. Aunt V. Aversa fought in a war before I was born, don't know much details as I haven't gotten to recent history with Muriel, but she never understood why mom forgave her, took her in and lets her near her children. Mom says everyone deserves a chance, that sometimes the worst things are done for good reasons or sometimes just because eof pain, but it doesn't mean you just abandon them'

Regina looked to be ready to tear up, Morgan seemed to have an attitude she wished Henry had, the moment the book sais she was evil she knew there was no swaying him, she was bad and the morons were good little heroes who shat rainbows. Still he was her son and she needed to keep him safe in case of incoming threats as well as the occasional idiot using him to hurt her. With a flick of her wrist Henry was covered in a blue aura, which confused him for a moment before being picked up and brought to face height

'Mom, what are you doing?' he asked worried

'Keeping you safe. Mommie loves you and this way I know you won't be sneaking around and getting hurt' Regina answered first giving him a small kiss the covered his face... before opening her mouth and sliding the boy inside, her tongue pushing him toward the back of her throat before he could try to stop him. Regina swallowed, her magic supressing her gag reflex enough for him to slide into her stomach without issue. Looking back at Morgan she was surprised to she he had not really reacted to what she'd just done 'What?' she mutters to herself

'Plegian women use similar charms and spells as well, thought they usually shrink their child or lover rather than grow themselves' Morgan tells her as his explanation.

Regina shrugs, the boy made sense after all 'Now what to do with you?'
12532212211122.title: Regina finds them first

125322122111221.content:
Morgan gulped at the expression on Regina's face, he'd seen it quite few times on Tharja and Aversa back home 'Um are you alright?'

Regina nods 'Yes little one. Your world is ravaged by a demon that is your mother's dark side correct?' she asks to which Morgan nods 'Then I think it's best you stay with me. If she comes through I'm the biggest person in Storybrooke so you're safest with me and if she doesn't... well you'll need a parental figure so why not me?' she smirked as the tactician began to panic

'But, but, but I came here to fix things, not stay' he argued but Regna still smiled

'Yes but you've said yourself that you're fighting a god alone, you have no chance. I'll keep you safe and sound with me'

'But I need to do this' Morgan protested as Regina sighed and grabbed him, bringing him up to eye level

'You are brave but you are only 11. I will no let a child throw away their life because they're being stupid, you saw what I did to protect my own son'

'Yeah but...'

'Do you want to join him in my stomach, because if that's what it takes I will' Morgan sighs before agreeing 'I'll stay' to which Regina grins widely and gently kisses his little body 'In that case I think we should head home, the mansion has so many empty rooms I'm sure you will have many places to chose from' with her hand flat Regina began to walk from the cemetery back in the direction of her home.

After about 10 minutes she noticed Morgan was staring at her breasts, which confused her mostly because he was too young to have an interest in them yet 'Um Morgan, what are you doing?'

'Aunt Aversa always put me between her breasts when she shrinks me. I guess I simply assumed because you feel like her minus the blond hair that the same would occur, really I noticed they looked just as soft and squishy as Aversa and Tharja's and I guess I zoned out and just started staring. Sorry Miss' Morgan explained with a rapidly spreading blush, which Regina mirrored

Well I'm not putting you between them, but I suppose I could just let you sit up here' Regina offered straightening out her suit. Morgan nodded in agreement and Regina gently deposited him on top of her chest, the boy gently swaying with her steps as she continued her journey

A little while later they arrived and it was Morgan's turn to comment 'Um Miss Regina'

'Yes'

'How are you going to fit in there?' he asked pointing to where he assumed Regina and Henry's home was

Regina chuckled, causing Morgan to bounce around 'It's quite simple, I'll just have to make it more my size' she smiled and raised both hands, thick purple smoke covering a city block with the house in the centre. After a few minutes the smoke faded and Regina was standing outside the door of a house perfectly her scale 'The bedrooms may be a little big for you now, but both you and Henry are welcome to stay in my room if you like' Regina offered as the door opened into response to her magical signature (best security system ever)

Meanwhile

'Ow' Emma groaned when she felt pain throb through her brain from a smack to her head.

'Hello dearie' a dual toned hiss greeted as her eyes opened finding a white haired woman grinning in front of her, the area around them and behind her cloaked in shadows

'Where am I?' she asked, the girl flashing a toothy grin

'Somewhere safe, somewhere we won't be disturbed while I get what I want. Oh and don't try screaming for help, I learnt a lot about privacy charms form mother and Mistress's gift made them practically impenetrable. Now' Noire hisses as she pushes Emma back into the chair she'd been tied to 'tell me about the magic of this world' Emma smiles slightly confusing Noire 'What?'

'Out of everyone in this crazy ass town you could've kidnapped, you picked the one person who knows fuck all about magic' she laughs before getting a kick to the gut

'Never mind, I will just drain the magic from you' she growls before stumbling, gripping her head, Emma wonders what happened until she noticed the spider web like cracks spreading through the barrier surrounding them. 'What is this magic?' she hisses, swinging her arm to dispel the barrier before it would swing back on her magical core. Emma gulped, when she saw the outside of the barrier she thought she had been shrunk... until she saw Noire looked just as confused.

Regina walked in to see something surprising in her kitchen: the white haired archer that had kidnapped her son's other mother, as well as said blond other mother.

'Noire!' Morgan yelled happily, almost boucning off Regina until the queen grabbed him to calm him down.

'Regina!' Emma called up, getting smacked by Noire's bow in the face as the white haired, black eyed girl stepped closer to the giantess

'You obviously know about magic, you will be useful to mistress' she smirked

'I think not' Regina smirks as with a click of her fingers Noire poofs from beside Emma to standing between Regina's heels 'I think you'll be of good use to me instead'

What happens now?
125322122111221.title: Morgan's new mom?

1253221221112211.content:
'I won't let you stop Grima's conquest of reality' Noire hissed pulling back her bow and forming an arrow with her magic. When she fired Regina flicked a finger and it poofed, exploding against the wall and given the size difference forming a small hole. Angry she fired again, and again, moving as she did expecting Regina to fight back in some way but she just continued to poof them away.

'Noire stop this, this isn't you!' Morgan yelled from Regina's shoulder, Noire by this point getting rather annoyed so instead of aiming for Regina's torso like before she aimed her bow a little higher and aimed for Morgan. This got a reaction from Regina just not the one she expected: Regina still poofed the arrow away, but it's destination was just in front of Noire's feet causing the white haired girl to be flung onto her back where she soon found herself trapped in Regina's fist.

'Now I was fine to let you tire yourself out when you were aiming for me, but then you targeted my son and I can't have you do that' Regina growled, Morgan in worry started hopping up and down, tugging on her hair.

'Mama, stop don't kill her she's been corrupted' Morgan cried, Regina stopping partly in surprise, she hadn't expected him to call her mama this soon (though part of her knew he did it to get this reaction from her, he was a tactician after all) but the other was touch of confused amusement

'I'm not going to kill her, there's not point. Plus we need information' she said opening her hand and before Noire could do anything Regina's hand filled with smoke and a cage formed. Noire blinked in confusion before clutching at her head, holding in a scream as Grima's mark glowed and smouldered on her chest. As she fell back panting, the glow of the brand dulling but still pulsing Regina looked on in confusion and Morgan bounced along her arm to his friend.

'Noire, are you there?' Noire blinked before reaching out to him through the bars

'Morgan you're okay! That's brilliant news I thought after Nah and Yarne you were sure to have been captured. How are you bud?' she smiled slightly before taking in her surroundings and frowning

''Noire do you know where we are?'' Morgan asked

'Yeah. This place feels wrong, the magic is just off''

'Morgan, what happened?' Regina asks, placing Morgan and Noire's cage on the counter, Emma following at a safe distance to avoid being stepped on

'I'm not sure, what did you do?' he replies waving his hand in the direction of the cage

'I conjured a way to capture her, and her own magic sustains it so even trying to escape wll just tire her out' Regina answered proudly. Morgan grins widely and claps his hands

'Of course! The cage is feeding on Grima's magic because it's the most potent energy within it's grasp, meaning Noire is free. The only downside is it would only work inside the cage and I'm not sure my method of purification would do anything in this world

'What's going on?' Emma asks, Regina finally remembering the cute little blond picks her up and drops her down between the 2 kids

'These 2 are from another world, the girl was evil until a second ago and Morgan is trying to save her from a demon that was once his mother. Excuse me' Regina paraphrased as she steps over to the sink where retching noises can be heard.

'Do I even want to know?' Emma asks referring to the giantess behind them, while Noire laughs 'What's so funny?'

'Seems this Regina person is more Plegian than I expected' Noire answers with a smile 'Not surprising, she has the chest of one' at Emma's confused expression she elaborated 'Plegians such as Morgan's mom and aunt as well as my mom and to a lessor extent me are known for their large breasts and high magical skill. Sound like Regina?' Emma nods

'Glad to see my assets come up in conversations around you Ms Swan' Regina deadpans as she comes back to the group

'Hi Mom' Henry greets, getting pulled into a hug by his blond parent

'Henry, where have to been?'

So Henry explains everything, meeting Morgan re-finding Regina, even getting eaten which he described as a strange but not bad experience, a statement that had Regina grinning at Emma's shocked expression. The fun was momentarily derailed when Regina stumbled, almost flattening Emma before catching herself

'Mom!'
'Regina!'

The witch raised a hand to dismiss it 'It's fine, just a little drained after all the magic I used today. That and just look at the time' she waved a hand at the window, everyone surprised by how dark it was getting 'I think somebody needs to go to bed, though you'll all have to stay in my room. Just for tonight of course, I don't think it's a good idea for me to cast again tonight' With that she picked up Morgan Henry and Emma in one hand and Noire's cage in the other before walking up the stairs.

'So what are you going to do with her?' Emma asks, eyes trained on Noire who was lying on her back

'Well Morgan says she's herself as long as she remains inside the cage till Morgan finds a cure, with our help of course' Regina answers, whether she means herself and Emma or the 5 of them (Noire included) Emma wasn't sure but they made it to Regina's room to soon for her to care

So the question is how tired are everyone? Regina is magically drained and crazy shit has happened to everyone else, so do they want to try calm down and relax together or just all go straight to sleep?
1253221221112211.title: Regina captures Noire

choices: Henry & Morgan one pillow, Emma curled up with Regina on the other
12532212211122111.content:
'Okay anyone ready for bed?'

'But mooooom' Henry whined 'I don't want to sleep yet. Can we play a little? Nothing major just a little something to wind down with?' he asked with a pout

'Oh can we play chess? Mom taught me how to play but I haven't gotten to play against anyone other than mom, aunt Versa and Aunt Tharja' Morgan asked, his pout matching Henry's almost perfectly

'I'll play, my mom taught me too, she's really good at it' Henry answered, both boys now grinning widely

'My boys, bonding over strategy games' Regina cooed as she poofed up a chess set, though it was her size it was also light enough for the boys to move them around, if only just.

'Morgan's gonna crush him, I'd bet money on it... if I had any this world money' Noire cheered, but her boasts petered out at the end.
Emma disagrees 'No way, the kid learnt from Regina he's gonna be fine'

Regina chuckles as she sits back between the arguing girls 'I don't want to pick favourites between my boys but Henry has been rather distracted with all the Storybook stuff and it sounds like Morgan regularly plays against experts so I think he'll win in the end'

'Geez Regina let the kid be in the world a day before you adopt him, though on saying that I wish I had someone like you when I was their age' Emma scolded then admitted as she leaned against the curve of Regina's hip.

Morgan smiled at Regina's praise, while the level of affection she was shoving was strange so soon he assumed she was just someone who cared deeply and fell hard, it actually reminded him of stories he'd been told about Tharja and his mom, she made her feelings known practically the moment they met. Shaking his head he went with Robin's usual opening play, not that he thought he could achieve the victory he'd seen his mom do

''Again, again!'' Morgan cheered from his chair, watching his parents play the shortest chess game he'd ever seen

Chrom sat there with his mouth on the table 'But, but how? That was like 5 moves'

Robin giggled 'Well I'm your chief strategist for a reason love'

'Again, again!'

Chrom laughed and shook his head 'No can do kiddo, want to take my place?'

'Okay'

5 mins later

'Damn it, hey Regina can I pay you back tomorrow?' Emma complained Noire and Regina sprouting matching evil grins as Morgan is clearly winning, though Henry at least was holding his own to a certain degree.

'Both of us Swan, I bet on Morgan too' the white haired archer chimed

'Hey Regina can you move my Queen across the board?' All the way' Morgan asked, pointing to where Henry's white bishop currently was.

'Sure kiddo' Regina said moving the piece, her sleepwear causing bouncing that would cause embarrassment for Henry but Morgan was used to it given his history and extended family

Morgan woke to gentle swaying and the all encompassing feel of soft flesh around him. Smiling slightly he knew exactly where he was, this having happened he knew all the likely candidates by their skin tone: Robin's skin was snow white like her hair, in fact even paler still. Tharja had the slight tan of all Plegians but it clearly showed she spent most of her time indoors working on her craft. And then their was his current location, the much darker tones of Aversa, caused by her much more outdoors-y lifestyle under the harsh Plegian sun.

'Hi little buddy, we're going on an adventure' Aversa cheered, Morgan's surroundings bouncing as she giggled. Despite himself he smiled and lay back against her breast, safe and content knowing he'd be having a fun day with hid aunt... providing his over-protective sister didn't find out

'Damn it!' Henry yelled realising he was in check, pacing back and forth 'Sigh I give'

'Are you sure Henry?' Morgan asks, not sure he wanted the game to end like this

'Yeah Mor, my brain is currently fried, maybe we can play again tomorrow' Henry yawned and Morgan nodded before he felt his own yawn building

'Ah my little boys are sleepy' Regina cooed, picking both of them up in separate hands before moving to the top of her bed, Emma trying to follow while Noire just slipped into the bed Regina had already conjured in her cell.

'Night mom' Henry mumbled as he curled up and was already almost dead to the world

'Goodnight sweet prince'


''AHHHH!'

'Morgan what's wrong?' Robin asks as she rushes into her son's room, the 5 year old bluenette curled up holding his knees

'I, I had a nightmare mom' he squeaked, trying to hide his face from her gaze

'Oh my beautiful boy. What happened?'

'There were these grey things and they were hurting people, everything was on fire and people were... dead. I was trying to find you, Luci, Dad, Versa anyone but you weren't there, nobody was anywhere. I was alone and afraid, and then I woke up' Morgan weeped as he was pulled into Robin's tight, comforting embrace, his head resting on her bosom.

'There, there Morgi, mamma's here. Mamma will always be here for you'

'P-p-promise?'

'I promise, you have so many people who love you, someone will always be there to hold you close' Robin whispered into his hair, also reminding her self to cut it as she could see it was getting in his eyes 'Want me to stay here with you tonight?'

'Dad won't mind?'

'Dad might sneak in, but more likely he'll see you need comfort and leave us be'

'Okay mom Goodnight'

'Goodnight sweet prince'


'Morgan?' Regina called, noticing the boy had gotten quiet, then seeing tears dripping down his cheeks 'Oh no, what's wrong?'

Morgan sniffled 'I-I-I miss my mom!' he cried and a cascade of tears flowed from his eyes

'Morgan, Morgan! Regina bring him over here quick' Noire yelled, stretching her arm out through the bars. Regina worrying about the kid put him down right next to her, Noire gently squeezing his shoulder 'Morgi, look at me! You aren't alone, we'll get our parents back and you'll see your mom again. But I'm here too, as long as the people who care can be together we can get through this' her tone was much gentler now, and she noticed the tears had slowed.

Morgan flinched slightly when she felt unfamiliar arms wrapped around his middle 'Don't worry kid, me and Regina will keep you safe and help you get your parents back. Plus I've only known you a few hours and you're already latching onto my heart and Regina's too if she's claiming you as her own.

Another pair joined her own 'Yeah Morgan, I never had much family other than Mom and then Emma but you're definitely the brother I never had' Herny said laying his head on Morgan's shoulder, he still looked almost asleep but he could feel how important this was for them all.

Morgan sniffled 'Really?' he had a watery smile as her felt a fingertip ruffle his hair

'As much as I'd love to keep a wonderful little man like you to myself, I can't deprive a mother anymore than I could give up Henry. We're going to save your family Morgan, but you better come visit Aunt Gina and cousin Henry when this is all over'

'Oh can I be Auntie Em? I always wanted to be auntie em?' Emma asked with a grin and raised hands, causing Morgan to laugh as he leaned against Henry's once more drooping form

'Yes Emma you can be Auntie Em' Regina answered with an eye roll but there was no anger in her tone or look, there was amusement and care.

'If there was any world I got stuck in, I'm glad it was this one' he mumbled as he too drooped, the cascade of emotion sapping the last of his energy after the long day he's had

I love you Morgan' Noire whispered, pushing his fringe out of his eyes 'He should be fine now' she said to Regina how nodded then moved her cell from the end of the bed to her bedside locker

'This way we're all together when Morgan wakes up'

'Speaking of which' Emma chimed in, having grabbed the end of Regina's sleepshirt when she carried the boys back to the pillows 'we never actually discussed sleeping arrangements'

'Oh...'

How do we do this?
12532212211122111.title: Relaxation, fun and memory flashes

choices: One of the giantess Grima sent over (They saw her through the window)
125322122111221112.content:
While Regina knew Morgan was already used to breasts (a little too much used too for his age but Regina wasn't going to judge) Henry on the other hand hasn't really done anything as intimate with Regina compared to what she knows about Morgan and his own family. So she placed the two boys on one pillow and deposited Emma right next to her on the other pillow and both women soon fell asleep.

Morgan was in a room that was pure white knowing it was some sort of dream. "Hello Morgan" Morgan turned to see his mother, Robin, who had gentle smile on her face and open arms. "Mom, I've missed you so much!" Morgan cried running into his mother's embrace despite it being a dream he could still feel her warmth. "How is this possible mom, I thought when you got corrupted you turned into Grima?" Morgan asked looking up, Robin looked down at her beautiful boy. "Grima and I share a body, while she controls it I can still see whatever she see, I'm here to to talk to you before she notices I'm gone." Robin explained, Morgan nodding in response. "While I can't see where you are right now I do know that the you method of purification will work in the world you're in but it will require a gentle touch something that you have and excel in. As well if you purify my body all the other shepherds that have been corrupted will go back to normal, although it will not effect they're size but that is a lot less important. Now I need to show you something." Robin took Morgan's hand and suddenly they were in Grima's lair, the goddess herself standing in front of giant Lucina, Aversa and Tharja (Tharja being the same size as Regina while Lucina and Aversa were taller but were still smaller than Grima, I am a stegosaurus). "Look Morgan" Robin said point at Grima's (or her own, whatever this stuff is confusing) cleavage to see Chrom unconscious in it. "Dad's still alive" Morgan whispered very happy. "Yes for whatever reason Grima is keeping all of the shepherds alive, but the same sadly can't be said for the villagers, I can't keep track of how many innocent villagers Grima has had killed." Robin replied gripping Morgan's hand tightly.

"Now I haven't received word from Noire yet about the mission, so I'm sending the three of you in once I regain enough energy to do so." Grima told the three giantesses who nodded. "Yes master Grima" Aversa and Tharja said in response "Yes mother" Lucina said her eyes red, and Grima's brand replacing her mark of the Exalt, as well Lucina wasn't wearing her bindings that she used to make her breasts look smaller (although Lucina made a personal rule she would only where them if she was preparing for a fight which rarely happened thankfully) Robin turned to Morgan and said to him"I know you can stop Grima" she then hugged him tightly whispering into his ear "I love you my sweet prince I will see you soon."

Morgan woke up next to Henry who was awake as well. "Hey Morgan, what was- I mean what is your mom like?" He asked to the tactician. "She's great, she's so nice and kind, also very very smart, she was the one who first shrunk me when I was playing hide and seek with my sister when I was reaalllly little I asked her to hide me and I guess she was feeling really frisky at the time so she just shrunk me and we played together until Lucina found me. She's also really really really pretty and strong and has lots of magic I once heard she beat ten guys at once with a simple fire tome. She is very good at keeping me safe and she taught me basically everything I know!" Morgan rambled Henry paying attention to every word. "She sounds like a wonderful person, I would love to meet her one day." Henry said and before Morgan could say thank you the two boys heard a loud groan turning and saw....

Lucina arrived in the FE dimension
1253221221112211122.content:
The two boys saw through the window Lucina (who was thankfully several blocks away) stretching arms groaning. "Morgan who is that?" Henry whispered hoping Lucina couldn't hear them (she couldn't but you can't be too sure). "My older sister by eight years, Lucina, Grima must of sent her." Morgan replied not mentioning the fact there were two other giantesses that Grima sent over but Morgan wasn't entirely sure Henry would believe him. "Well she won't be able to get in here, Mom's magic only allows herself and whoever she wants inside the house." Henry assured Morgan who was looking rather nervous.

"Peek-a-boo" He two boys turned around to see Lucina bending down with a large toothy grin and a twinkle in her eye. Henry and Morgan screamed like little girls (you would too in their situation) before Lucina snatched them up. "Now, now little cuties don't waste your voices no one will take you away from me, I used a very strong spell on this pathetic so-called evil Queen so she won't be waking up soon enough to take you back from me. Now while I am here for Morgan, I don't want you to be blabbing to your mommies about this, I'm sure mother will find a use for you probably as a snack or pet for some of the more faithful followers. Unfortunately this hex works on one person at a time so you two will have to stay in my stomach." Lucina grinned bringing the boys over to her open maw, Henry and Morgan gulped as Lucina plopped them onto her tongue and shut her mouth rubbing her tongue over the boys, noting that Henry was rather tasty, although Morgan was a tastier treat but she already knew his taste, moaning a bit before swallowing them. Thankfully Lucina was too distracted to notice Noire's cage so she teleported out of the house.

Inside of Lucina's stomach Morgan and Henry were sitting feeling Lucina's movement. "I'm sorry Henry about this I should of been more aware to notice Lucina's magical signature." Morgan apologized to his friend who was in the opposite side of the stomach. "It's fine Mom will save us" Henry said but Morgan wasn't so sure himself and thought back to his sister.

Morgan looked up to Lucina a lot thinking her to be the worlds most best big sister (he knew he was being bias but he was pretty sure he correct nevertheless and that Aversa was second place since she was his mom's older sister) Lucina actually had more magic than Morgan, so she was taught magic by their mother, Aversa and Tharja. That is until an incident where Lucina had accidentally hurt Morgan and she refused to learn anymore magic but after years of coaxing she got back on the wagon and now could use C rank tomes (she still preferred to use swords) and could use a shrink spell. Once Lucina had learnt the shrink spell she often shrunk Morgan giving the excuse that it's for practice but Morgan didn't mind at all and loved playing and cuddling with his sister. Sometimes if Morgan ever got too tired during their fun Lucina would happily allow Morgan to be nestled in her bosom while she would read a book of something else that didn't require much movement. Lucina had moments where she would get a little too over protective, one time when Tharja had shrunk Morgan to spend time with him and didn't tell anyone, Lucina freaked out when she learned he was missing and when she found Tharja she spanked her with wooden paddle saying Tharja should of gotten Robin permission first (she didn't mind but was a little peeved at not telling her first) and repeated "kidnapping his wrong" after that incident Lucina was ground for two weeks. Despite it all Morgan loved his sister deeply and gave her immense amounts of love and respect.

Morgan was drawn out of his thoughts when Lucina had stopped walking.
"What's happening?" Henry asked Morgan

What is happening though?

12532212211122112.content:
'Time for bed everyone!' Regna orders as she reaches her bedroom and dropped most of them on her bed, Noire's cage sitting nicely on her beside table

'But moooooom, I'm not yawn tired' Henry complains, but it wasn't doing a good job of it, due to his tiredness, Morgan not doing much better having spent the day escaping giant corrupted versions of friends and family and then hopping across several realities. Emma was less physically and more mentally exhausted with all the crazy shit that had happened lately, she just wanted either to sleep or for it all to be a dream

'Now Henry, what were we saying about lying? If you don't want to be lied to you shouldn't lie, especially not to your mother' Regina mock scolds, Henry too tired to care so just nods and waits for whatever is needed 'You guys stay put, I'll get a blanket and you both will be up by my pillow tonight' she explains before disappearing into her closet.

Emma and Morgan flop onto their backs, Henry at least trying to stay upright until Regina returns, Noire watching with silent amusement as she lies on the bed Regina has added with barely a thought. It wasn't palace quality but it was still good for what it was.

Regina appears a few minutes later, setting up a makeshift bed for her boys on the pillow next to her bedside, probably so she could keep an eye on all the kids easier then disappears to change into sleepwear after tucking them in. Not long after Regina reappears, slips under the covers and whispers 'Goodnight my little men, we'll get to work tomorrow' jokingly before falling asleep herself, the magic she'd been using all day taking more out of her than she admitted to the kids and Emma. The gentle sound of her breathing soothed and helped Morgan and Henry slide into dreamland


Henry sits back up a few minutes later 'Hey where's Emma?' he asks getting a cackle like laughter from Noire, which also causes Morgan to sit up

'Morgan seeing as Gina's an honorary Plegian, tell me what Tharja, Aversa or I would do with a little person sleeping companion?' she asks with a grin

'Eh... cleavage or butt crack if it was Aversa or Tharja, with you they'd be where Henry and I am, sitting on the pillow, unless it was me then you'd make sure I was nice and comfortable between your breasts' Morgan answers, Henry assuming he answered correctly if Noire's blush (visible in the moonlight) was anything to go on

'You're saying Mom put Emma ... you know , between her...' Henry couldn't get the words out, whether due to his age or the fact it was about his mom the archer didn't know

'Her breasts yes, you act like this is unexpected. Regina is a lovely woman and Emma isn't so bad herself, plus their magic reaches out for one another. By Grima if we were back home other mages would be asking why they weren't engaged yet' Noire explains as though it was the simplest thing in the world, and for her it was.

'No way, Mom and Emma don't think like that, they hate each other' Henry argues

Noire shrugs 'I don't know kid, maybe Regina wanted to share the warmth... of her massive rack. Anyway blondie is nestled away between them snoozing her little head off like Regina herself, don't worry about it and go to sleep' she sighs and flops onto the bed, closing her eyes and falling back to sleep

'Was she lying?' Henry asks Morgan who shakes his head

'I don't know about the whole thing, but she was telling the truth about Emma being safe. There's no reason for Regina to harm Emma after what's happened, especially after saving her butt from Noire. Relax Henry it'll be fine' at this point Morgan curls up into a ball and tries to sleep, Henry sighing as he knows there was nothing he could do anyway and goes back to sleep.

The next morning...

Henry awoke and turned on his side noticing Morgan was standing at the edge of the bed. "Hey, Morgan what are you doing?" Henry asked walking over to him, Morgan turned around his eyes slightly puffy possibly from crying. "Hey Hen, I'm sorry but I have to go, I know that your mom has said I can't do this alone but I have to. I don't want anyone else getting hurt, I'm sure I'll see you guys soon once I get the cure I need, but good-bye for now and I'll see you again on a sunny day." Morgan said smiling turning back around. Sukeruton'u~ōku Morgan whispered before jumping off the bed. Henry quickly ran over to see Morgan had vanished from existence rather than hitting the ground. "This isn't good" Henry whispered

Morgan had landed in Regina's vault, literally fell and landed feet first in the vault. "clever way of using my shortcuts by jumping off of something." Morgan turned around and saw Sans one of people he met in the other realities he traveled across to get into this realm. "Sans, what the heck are you doing here?" Morgan hissed at the skeleton. "i'm here to help make that cure you were talking about, besides i'm on break so i thought i could kill some time." Sans reasoned to the tactician. "But you do know that you have zero knowledge of potion making and your knowledge of magic is limited to that of your world's magic." Morgan reasoned hoping in his head that Henry didn't wake Regina. "oh yeah, well then i'm going to grillby's do you want me to bring you anything back?" Sans asked while Morgan was shuffling around through some things. "Thanks for the offer but I have a bit of a weak stomach, when I eat a non-breakfast food for breakfast I start to feel all queasy and nauseous." Morgan replied Sans shrugging in response and leaving.

Morgan was going through possible ingredients for him to use to create the fabled Pure Falchion. Apparently in Ylissean tales of old the Pure Falchion was said to be able to reverse any form of corruption or mind control by simply doing a small cut on the target. As Morgan was gathering ingredients he was also randomly singing a habit he had whenever he had to gather stuff or go shopping. "Come get a look! It's nothing like you've seen! Its my trendy new bendy ink machine! So amazing it's crazy! Believe me. It's true! Allow me to show you what my ink machine can do! Come take a peek cause nothing else compares! There's no fee. So feel free to stop and stare! From the spouts to the sprockets and the bits in between I'm in love with my ink machine!" Part of Morgan's habit was that he would somehow sing songs he's never heard of it was strange but he enjoyed it as he continued gathering various things to create Pure Falchion.

but who was the person yelling?
