15232222222212211.content:
"Next week, marks the beginning of UA entry exams", states a man on tv. "UA, interesting- ah giant foot!", you shout jumping against the store wall. Life was hard for you, living on the streets like this. When your quirk manifested, you became 6 inches tall. You also had healing powers, and slightly enhanced physical ability. Your healing powers only fixed minor cuts and bruises though, good also for fending off infection and disease.
Not long after your quirk manifested, your parents saw you as a burden and kicked you to the curb. Ever since then, you have lived on the street alone. Right now your are heading to the park, it takes about an hour thanks to your enhanced physical ability.
So now here you are, walking next to the sidewalk. Just ahead of you, there is a bench. You climb onto the arm rail, and sit down. "Huh, I hear of this UA every year. A school for aspiring heroes, I've never been to a school. Kinda hard when your homeless; stupid quirk. Stupid tiny body, stupid healing powers", you say out loud.
"Wow, my quirk lets me jump really high, stick to almost any surface too. My tounge is 20 meters long, I can also spit up my stomach so I can clean it. Lastly I can secrete a toxic mucus that stings just a little", a voice said. You realize the voice is addressing you, and turn your head to the source. Sitting on the bench, is a girl about your age. She is looking at you, and tilts her head slightly. "So your homeless?", she asked. "Yeah, since about a week after my quirk first manifested itself", you tell her. "What!? But quirks manifest around four years of age", she said. "Didn't stop my folks", you said bitterly.
"Alone, all these years...", the girl said quietly. "Yeah, my biggest struggle is food. Though I do hear a lot of people study, if I take a placement exam I'd probably get into high school like I'm supposed to be. I'm supposed to be starting high school this spring anyway. But I'm not in the system. Course like I said, food is my worry. All I ever find is scraps, if I'm lucky", you tell her.
"Oh my goodness, introductions. I'm Asui Tsuyu; you are?", Tsuyu asked. "Don't remember, I'm just a kid nobody ever sees. Except you", you tell her. "We'll figure it out later", Tsuyu said as she grabbed you. "What gives?", you ask her as she puts you in her purse. "We have to get to the store before it closes, after that we can head home", she answered. "What do you mean 'we' Asui-Chan?", you asked. "Call me Tsuyu, or Tsu. And I mean 'we' because your coming with, I'm not leaving you behind", she replied. "But why, you barely know me", you tell her. Tsuyu looked at you, and you saw tears in her eyes as she walked. "Because, someone needs to show you love. To show that they care, and if your parents won't; then damnit leave it to me", she said as she walked into the store. She made her purchases, and the left for the train station.
15232222222212211.title: Meet Tsuyu

152322222222122112.content:
After a long train ride with Tsu. With you sitting in her purse bored beyond belief, Tsu finally arrived at her home. Greeting her mother. She runs up stairs towards her room. Once inside Tsu closes the door behind her and sets the purse on the desk. She then sits down and pulls you out from the purse.

You watch as a giant hand enters the purse and pull you out. Your hit by a blinding light until your eyes finally adjusts to the light. There you see Tsu's frog face staring straight at you. Being as emotionless as the first time you met her "I'm sorry, but I don't think my parents will allow me to let a boy live here, so I'm going to be hiding you in my room. I hope that's okay"

Tsuyu then puts you down onto the bed as she starts cleaning up her room "sorry it's such a mess. I didn't think that I would pick you up today." "Why?" you ask Tsuyu as she turns to you "Why would you help me, why would you give me a home" your so confused. No one cared about you, not even your parents, but she seems to. "Because, it's what a hero does" Tsuyu said with complete conviction. "What?" "I wanna be a hero when I grow up, and helping people is what a hero does.

You were so confused as to what she meant. Why is she so nice. "Anyway" Tsuyu said changing the subject "I Think I hear mom say Dinners ready so I'm going down, I'll be back soon, if someone comes in hide. Ribbit" Tsuyu then left the room.

You don't know what's weirder. The fact Tsu is so nice or that she just ribbited like a frog.

After some time of looking over the room and counting in your head. You see the door open and in comes _____________
152322222222122112.title: Into Tsuyu's Room

1523222222221221121.content:
A strange girl walked in, she had a small head; which made her face look big, and she had pigtails. 'A younger sibling, perhaps?', you think as you hide behind a pillow. You discreetly watch her as you hide, she looks around with a cursory glance. "I thought Tsuyu was talking to someone before, but nobody's here. Was big sis hearing voices; or me maybe?", at this point she's started to cry. "Satsuki, what are you doing in here? Oh no, are you crying?", Tsuyu put her arms around her sister.
Tsuyu listened as her sister explained the voice dilemma, and expressed her fear of the asylums separating the two of them. Tsuyu was lost as she looked you from around her sister, and you just walked closer to them and away from the pillow. Tsuyu gaped as she saw you stand on the bed, right behind her sister.
"Satsuki, Can you a really big secret for me?", Tsuyu asked her sister. Satsuki nodded, trying and failing to choke back a hiccup. Tsuyu pointed you out, and Satsuki stared in wonder.
"Satsuki; this is well, he doesn't remember his name. But I found him all alone, and brought him here. I need you to keep him a secret, or mom and dad might make us get rid of him. He was kicked to the street not long after he developed a quirk", Tsuyu told her sister. "He seems nice enough", Satsuki said. "Bedtime sweetie", Tsuyu told her sister.
"Your sister seemed nice. But earlier, you said you want to be a hero. What do you mean?", you asked tsuyu as she got ready for bed herself. "There's a school called UA, after quirks came about so did heroes and villains. UA trains heroes for the future. I'm applying and have to take the exam. Now are you sure you felt nothing when you saw me change? You never had 'the talk', have you? Did you feel hard down there?", she asked. "It felt odd", you said. "Sounds like a Yes. Now in the morning, I'm giving you a proper shower. Its obvious you just had the rain. No arguments", Tsuyu said with her hands set firm on her hips, and giving you a slight glare. "Ok", you said. "Good, ok then; bedtime!", Tsuyu said grabbing you. As she sat on her bed, Tsuyu gave you a goodnight kiss on top of your head. Then she set you....

15232222222212212221.content:
Kaminari Denki was a student at the prestigious Hero School U.A Academy, a first year from class 1.A while he isn't very intelligent he has a strong electrokinetic quirk and...

Kaminari's train of thought got derailed when he bumped into a second year student a rather imposing second year student, "Watch where you're going first year" the second year angrily said.

Kaminari would usually apologize but he was in a bad mood due to flunking yet another written test and of course Mr.Aizawa had to scold him in front of the whole class because he was the only one who had to take remedial lessons which had the side effect of making him the biggest laughing stock in class and he also overheard some class 1-B students mocking him behind his back, to put it simply Kaminari was pissed and he wasn't gonna let some stuck up senior act all superior over him.

"You watch where you're going punk" he boldly stated, "Kid i'm giving you till the cunt of 3 to apologize" the second year told him not that Kaminari cared since well if the second year tried to harm him then he could just report him well Kaminari wasn't really a snitch but he could use it as a threat.

The second year counted to three while Kaminari just stood there unfazed then the second year grinned, "Times up kid" he said.

Kaminari felt a tingling feeling as if his bones were turning to powder while his skin was shedding and that's when it hit him the second year used his quirk on him and that quirk was affecting his body. As the second year walks away laughing more students show up and Kaminari just barely dodged them, he realized he was only an inch tall and he would be in massive trouble if he didn't find help.

That's when he saw her. Jirou Kyouka a girl Kaminari was sort of friends with, she often made fun of him but the two enjoyed each others company and Kaminari always got this odd feeling whenever he was around the rock enthusiast a warm and calming feeling that always...Kaminari realized Jirou was leaving and headed towards her grabbing onto her shoes and barely being able to stay on.

Jirou Kyouka was heading to her class it was a busy day but she looked forward to teasing Kaminari again, he was always easy to talk too and Jirou always got this warm and calming feeling whenever she's around him one that feels just like.. just like... just like someone climbing up her leg?

Jirou looked down and saw a bug, she didn't really mind but was ready to throw it away when all of a sudden she saw a weird spark that looked oddly like, "Denki?" she thought to herself, swiftly she picked up the bug and headed to the woman's restroom hiding in one of the bathroom stalls. She held the bug close to her eyes and couldn't believe what she saw, it was an inch tall Kaminari Denki.

"Kaminari, how the hell did you get so small" she asked in a whispering tone. "Some guy used his quirk to shrink me after I pissed him off" he said the boy felt embarrassed being held up by Jirou like that and he knew the girl would either scold him or laugh at him or both.

"You idiot *sigh* well I guess I should take care of you" Jirou told him, it was weird seeing him this small but at the same time Jirou couldn't help but think of how cute he is at that size, "Hey Jirou can you not show me to anyone else please, not even the teachers" he asked.

"Why would I do that?" she asked, "Look I can't be seen like this, you know I already have a bad rep because I flunked my test and I don't need anymore unwarranted attention" Kaminari answered.

""sigh" Allright fine, but be quiet when we're in class" Jirou told him, "Re..Really THANK YOU Jirou I'll never forget this" Kaminari said. Jirou felt bad for the shrunken boy but she didn't want to show Denki her softer side mainly because he'd tease her over it...but,,, maybe at that size he won't?

"So uhh where do you wanna stay" Jirou asked, "Anywhere just make sure it's comfortable. Jirou's mind started racing wondering if she could get away with hiding him in her "Private Parts" but she decided against it, "Decide for yourself or flush you" Jirou teased.

"Um allright just...please...no...flushing" Kaminari said, he wasn't sure if Jirou was just teasing him and he didn't want to find out.

"Is it okay if I stay in your ear?" Kaminari asked, "My ear why, it's the source of my quirk so it's not covert or anything" she said.

"Well it has enough open space and you can still hear with me inside because of your quirk also you'd be able to hear me better" Kaminari said.

Jirou was not expecting such a detailed answer so she relented and stuffed the boy on her ear, Kaminari was terrified at how far he was from the ground but felt safer knowing he had Jirou protecting him while Jirou herself felt bizarrely happy at the ordeal.

Jirou made her way to class unusually late, she grabbed her seat and hoped things work out.
15232222222212212221.title: Jirou is best girl

1523222222222212.content:
[For the sake of the story Laurel, Astra & Iris aren't dead (she might not be anyway, haven't seen the finale) and Caitlin isn't evil anymore. Really this is just to give more options but hey might as well be direct]

Caitlin paced worryingly as the portal hummed contently, it had been a month since all teams had beaten their respective 'Big Bad' and things were quiet, which was how Felicity had suggested the idea they have a girls night out (or maybe in) to celebrate, an idea that was transmitted to Kara on Earth 38 who quickly agreed as long as she could invite a few of her own buddies. Kara's buddies included her aunt, sister and both Danver's respective girlfriends who Caitlin was awaiting the arrival of. She took the role of organiser very seriously which was why she sent Jessie to get the drink, knowing they were going to need more given they were serving a speedster and 2 aliens, hell her own powers messed with alcohol consumption in a similar way so even more for them.

The cryokinetic sighed in relief when people started to appear: Kara happily bouncing out with a more reserved raven haired woman on her arm, followed shortly by a girl who had to be Kara's sister Alex and detective Sawyer as well as an older brunette (minus the white streak similar to Caitlin's own locks) in a well cut pantsuit and 'sexy librarian' glasses.

'Caitlin!' Kara yelped happily as she pulled the meta into a hug 'We're ready to party.... and we brought booze!' she cheered as Caitlin saw Astra raise bottles of what looked to be some kind of glowing yellow liquid. She wisely didn't ask what they were.

'Okay so I know you but who else have we got?'

'Well there's me and Astra, then there's Lena who is happy to meet people who won't judge her for her family, and then there's Alex and Maggie who will drink and probably not socialize that much as they'll be sucking face' Kara explained pointing to each person in turn, getting an annoyed 'HEY' from Alex at the comment, while Maggie chuckled.

'Okay then, given how many of us there is Iris has us set up in her place, Barry and the guys are all having a night out, give Oliver a chance to put his misspent youth to good use' Caitlin explains as she gives directions and checks with the others that they had the supplies and everyone had arrived in Central safely.

Later

Caitlin wasn't sure why she was worrying so much, the alien alcohol was very helpful, having the same effect on metas as it did on Kryptonians, meaning she was pleasantly drunk just like most of the others. This was also one of the few times recently she'd seen Laurel or Thea unwind plus Nyssa actually looked happy, but that may have something to do with the fact she had easy access to Sara's melons in her current outfit and her recently accepted fiancé had no problems with her playing, nor did she move very far from the newest Demon's head.

Kara was of similar mind about her fellow companions: with all the Cadmus and Daximite shenanigans none of them had had much time to relax or unwind, this was the perfect treat for all of them... they really did deserve it.

Nyssa smirked as she pulled a small pill bottle from her pocket 'What you doing love?' Sara asked with a slight slur nuzzling closer to her fiancé.

'I brought these from Nanda Parvat, League grade stealth compound' at Sara's confused look she elaborated 'Shrinking pills' the blond oooed, ' Originally I had planned for us to use these for a little night of fun to ourselves, but now it seems unfair to hog the fun between us... plus' she waves her hands to the giggling single girls and the couples who were currently making out 'I doubt any of them would have any problem with us joining them' Sara nodded before grabbing the bottle

'So what should we do?' she asked with a grin

'That's up to you beloved, do we stick to my original plan and shrink one of us, or do we share the love and drop some into the drinks of some of our tipsy companions?' she smiles as she sees the groups cutting loose: Lena roughly squeezing Kara's massive breasts as the Kryptonian nips at her ear, Alex getting double trouble as she squeezes Astra's firm rear while getting her head smothered between the combined boobage of the alien cougar and Detective Sawyer.

So who gets shrunk? (Also quick roll call: Caitlin, Jessie, Iris, Felicity, Laurel, Thea, Sara, Nyssa, Kara, Alex, Lena, Maggie and Astra)

153.title: A Web-Series

info.brief_description: You're shrunk / meet giant girls in fictional stories!  Books, TV, Movies, whatever!
info.description:
You are a background character from a popular work of fiction. A book, a television show, a movie, it's entirely up to you. When all of a sudden you find yourself in the presence of a female character who appears to you as a giant! Whether through her growing or you shrinking, you have to survive at your relatively smaller size, while also taking advantage of the fact that you can see these lovely ladies in a whole new way!

I AM LOOKING FOR CONTRIBUTIONS / CHAPTER ADDITIONS!

You can add onto any existing branch, I just ask that once you pick a path to go down, the chapters detailing actual interaction be a full paragraph MINIMUM.

No male giants, no scat. Everything else is fair game. Have fun!
